					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[About Us]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/about-us/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 29 Mar 2022 15:06:45 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?page_id=386</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>TECHODU is the number one technological and educational provider network in the World. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Our mission is to help the influential and aspirational to make astute decisions to get ahead. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>TECHODU International ensures no matter where you are you can keep up to date with the latest breaking technological and cyber security news.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We provide you with the perfect 24-hour global technological briefing. our fast-paced, hard-hitting technology coverage makes Us essential viewing for any senior technician leader.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In addition to our <a href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEdIw4yLoOtNnLZqapOB0OQ" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">YouTube channel</a>, available on <a href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEdIw4yLoOtNnLZqapOB0OQ" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">YouTube</a>, TECHODU is also available on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. Techodu.com is the greatest technological news source on the web, featuring a unique number of videos, web-exclusive videos, and analytical technological tools.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4>Techodu Mission</h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To produce efficient professionals in the field of engineering &amp; technology through a sustainable system of quality education and technical awareness development in an environment for learning and moral grooming.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4>Techodu strategy</h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Our strategy is to provide informational environments, News, technology awareness, and solutions that utilize resources effectively and efficiently while striving to realize our vision.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We apply innovation and technology to improve the sustainable performance of <a href="https://techodu.com/information-security-elements-explain-from-definition-of-cia/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">information technology</a>, services, solutions, and operations. We believe that sustainable development, as reflected in the principles of sustainable development, is achieved by developing better systems that maximize life-cycle benefits while minimizing economic, social, and environmental costs of ownership.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We will execute the strategy by working towards ambitious sustainable development goals.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[Term and condition]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/term-and-condition/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 29 Mar 2022 15:07:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?page_id=388</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Welcome to techodu.com!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of techodu's Website, located at techodu.com.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use techodu.com if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company’s terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client’s needs in respect of provision of the Company’s stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Netherlands. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Cookies</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We employ the use of cookies. By accessing techodu.com, you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the techodu's Privacy Policy.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Most interactive websites use cookies to let us retrieve the user’s details for each visit. Cookies are used by our website to enable the functionality of certain areas to make it easier for people visiting our website. Some of our affiliate/advertising partners may also use cookies.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>License</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Unless otherwise stated, techodu and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on techodu.com. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from techodu.com for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You must not:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Republish material from techodu.com</li><li>Sell, rent or sub-license material from techodu.com</li><li>Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from techodu.com</li><li>Redistribute content from techodu.com</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. techodu does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of techodu,its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, techodu shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>techodu reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You warrant and represent that:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so;</li><li>The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent or trademark of any third party;</li><li>The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy</li><li>The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You hereby grant techodu a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Hyperlinking to our Content</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Government agencies;</li><li>Search engines;</li><li>News organizations;</li><li>Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and</li><li>System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Website information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We may consider and approve other link requests from the following types of organizations:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>commonly-known consumer and/or business information sources;</li><li>dot.com community sites;</li><li>associations or other groups representing charities;</li><li>online directory distributors;</li><li>internet portals;</li><li>accounting, law and consulting firms; and</li><li>educational institutions and trade associations.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of techodu; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These organizations may link to our home page so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you are one of the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must inform us by sending an e-mail to techodu. Please include your name, your organization name, contact information as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our Website, and a list of the URLs on our site to which you would like to link. Wait 2-3 weeks for a response.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Approved organizations may hyperlink to our Website as follows:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>By use of our corporate name; or</li><li>By use of the uniform resource locator being linked to; or</li><li>By use of any other description of our Website being linked to that makes sense within the context and format of content on the linking party’s site.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>No use of techodu's logo or other artwork will be allowed for linking absent a trademark license agreement.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>iFrames</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Content Liability</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Your Privacy</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Please read Privacy Policy</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Reservation of Rights</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and it’s linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Removal of links from our website</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you find any link on our Website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We do not ensure that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the material on the website is kept up to date.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Disclaimer</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury;</li><li>limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation;</li><li>limit any of our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or</li><li>exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The limitations and prohibitions of liability set in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph; and (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As long as the website and the information and services on the website are provided free of charge, we will not be liable for any loss or damage of any nature.</p>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading {"level":1} -->
<h1>Privacy Policy for techodu</h1>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>At techodu, accessible from techodu.com, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by techodu and how we use it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in techodu. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the <a href="https://www.generateprivacypolicy.com/">Free Privacy Policy Generator</a>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Consent</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Information Techodu collect</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>How Techodu uses your information</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We use the information we collect in various ways, including:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Provide, operate, and maintain our website</li><li>Improve, personalize, and expand our website</li><li>Understand and analyze how you use our website</li><li>Develop new products, services, features, and functionality</li><li>Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes</li><li>Send you emails</li><li>Find and prevent fraud</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Log Files</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>techodu follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and are a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Cookies and Web Beacons</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Like any other website, techodu uses 'cookies'. These cookies are used to store information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors' browser type and/or other information.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For more general information on cookies, please read <a href="https://www.generateprivacypolicy.com/#cookies">the Cookies article on Generate Privacy Policy website</a>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Google DoubleClick DART Cookie</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Google is one of a third-party vendor on our site. It also uses cookies, known as DART cookies, to serve ads to our site visitors based upon their visit to www.website.com and other sites on the internet. However, visitors may choose to decline the use of DART cookies by visiting the Google ad and content network Privacy Policy at the following URL – <a href="https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads">https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Our Advertising Partners</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Some of advertisers on our site may use cookies and web beacons. Our advertising partners are listed below. Each of our advertising partners has their own Privacy Policy for their policies on user data. For easier access, we hyperlinked to their Privacy Policies below.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Google <a href="https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads">https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads</a></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Advertising Partners Privacy Policies</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of techodu.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on techodu, which are sent directly to users' browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These <a href="https://techodu.com/information-security-elements-explain-from-definition-of-cia/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">technologies</a> are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Note that techodu has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Third Party Privacy Policies</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>techodu's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Request that a business deletes any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>GDPR Data Protection Rights</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Children's Information</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>techodu does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Next-gen iPad Pro with Apple M2 chip coming in fall 2022]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/next-gen-ipad-pro-with-apple-m2-chip/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 29 Mar 2022 17:24:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=416</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>After launching the new iPad Air with the M1 chip, upgrading the iPad Pro seems like a logical next step for Apple. Bloomberg's Mark Gurman revealed that Apple is indeed working on a next-generation iPad Pro with a new chipset. According to his "Power On" newsletter, <a href="https://www.cnet.com/tech/computing/ipad-pro-rumors/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Apple will upgrade its iPad Pro</a> lineup by adding a new M2 processor under the hood. The device is likely to launch this fall.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Continuing his previous reports that Apple plans to launch "the craziest new hardware product in history" in the fall of 2022, Gurman speculates that the iPad Pro will be part of Apple's 2022 hardware lineup. As MacRumors points out, new iPad Pro models have been launched in March 2016, June 2017, October 2018, March 2020, and April 2021 -- with updates ranging from 13 to 16 months. This time around, however, it could take up to 19 months for Apple to launch the next-generation iPad Pro lineup.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The presence of the M2 chip means the upcoming iPad Pro will be more powerful than the current MacBook Air and 13-inch MacBook Pro, which will also be updated soon. The chipset is expected to have the same 8-core CPU as the M1, but it will get the speed and efficiency gains from TSMC's 4nm process. The Apple M2 chip can also be equipped with additional GPU cores, with 9- and 10-core GPU options, compared to the 7- and 8-core GPU options in the ‌‌M1‌‌ chips.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In addition to the new processor, the next-generation iPad Pro may also feature MagSafe charging for magnetic wireless charging, like the iPhone 12 and iPhone 13 series. While no rumors point to it, we speculate that Apple will bring a mini-LED display to the 11-inch iPad Pro to further differentiate it from the M1 iPad Air.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The more powerful new<a href="https://techodu.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"> iPad Pro</a> will continue to differentiate Apple's offerings from Qualcomm-powered rivals made by Samsung and Microsoft. While Apple often differentiates itself through software support, the company's hardware has been too powerful in recent years for rivals to keep up. If true, this year is no exception. Apple may still be the go-to for anyone who wants the absolute best tablet.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>The next generation of iPad Pro will feature the M2 chip and will be released in the fall</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Apple's March event left out the iPad Pro. Usually, March has always been the month of renewal for all iPads in case, in these years, this preface has ceased to exist and new products are introduced associated to other guidelines But the iPad Pro needs to be renewed. Indeed, the latest information indicates that in the fall we will see the new generation of the iPad Pro which has not been updated since last April. this new generation It will ship the as yet unknown Apple M2 chip and will be compatible with MagSafe magnetic charging.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":419,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter size-full"><img src="https://techodu.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Next-gen-iPadPro-with-Apple-M2-chip-1.jpg" alt="Next-gen-iPadPro-with-Apple-M2-chip" class="wp-image-419"/></figure></div>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>iPad Pro 11-inch 2021 model with Apple M1 chip on a desk with Magic keyboard and Apple pencil. New York, NY, USA May 21, 2021.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>M2 chip will introduce in July: &nbsp;forward gen &nbsp;of iPad Pro</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Apple is taking a little longer than usual to update the iPad Pro. Currently, iPhone takes more than 12 months for its new update. The latest Pro update arrived in April 2021 and the next generation of the iPad Pro is expected to see the light of day in the fall of this year. This chip has two main features: the arrival of MagSafe on the iPad Pro and the M2 chip.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;<a href="https://www.digitaltrends.com/computing/apple-m2-release-date-price-specs/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Apple's M2 chip</a> is the second generation of the M chip released by Apple in 2020. It is an ARM-based chip designed by Apple and is currently included in a wide variety of products: MacBook Air, Mac Mini, iPad Pro, MacBook Pro, and iMac. The ultimate goal of this chip is that the hardware of apple products is completely designed by apple so as not to lose a bit of performance.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This M2 chip, as is commonly said, ought to have a similar 8-center processor as the recent M1 chip. However, the jump will be made towards 5 nanometers which, unlike the 4 nanometers of the M1, aims to benefit in terms of speed and efficiency. It is guessed that the M2 will likewise have 9 and 10 center GPU choices instead of the M1's 7 and 8 centers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The information comes from Gourman, a well-known analyst who predicts Big Apple's next steps. Without a doubt, he guarantees that in the fall of 2022 that Apple is planning to send off "the most insane line of new equipment items in its set of experiences ".</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Mac is supposed to be going to send off another age of iPad Pro with a cutting edge processor, the Apple M2, which will likewise be found on the following MacBook,</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>MacBook Air and Mac mini After the presentation of the M1-prepared iPad Air at Apple's extraordinary "Look Performance" occasion recently, the iPad Pro line has turned into the objective of many hypotheses about its next update. However, it will be several months before Apple updates its high-end tablets.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;According to information from journalist Mark Gurman of Bloomberg, who is generally very well informed, Apple should launch a new iPad Pro in the fall of 2022 even more, powerful than the previous generation. This new model, which will arrive almost a year and a half after the iPad Pro with an M1 SoC, would be equipped with an M2 chip that will be found in the manufacturer's computers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>&nbsp;WHAT DO WE KNOW ABOUT THE APPLE M2 CHIP?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;A while before its presentation, we definitely realize a ton about Apple's M2 chip. First of all, it would be engraved in 4 nm, against 5 nm for previous versions This chip is supposed to pack as numerous CPU centers as the age and up to 9 or 10 designs centers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In addition, this new iteration should rely heavily on energy efficiency, as was the case with the first generation. It could therefore consume less energy than the first generation by offering the same performance, thus improving the autonomy of the device, or consume as much energy and offer superior performance.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In any case, the up-and-coming age of iPad Pro could be accessible in restricted amounts, since Apple is right now encountering creation issues with its chip. As a reminder, it is also expected to be featured in a new generation of MacBook Air, 13-inch MacBook Pro, and Mac mini at the end of the year. Once more in regards to the iPad Pro, Apple ought to in any case lift the shroud on two unique models, and the 12.9-inch adaptation would be the main one to utilize a smaller than usual LED screen. Source: Power On Newsletter by Mark Gurman.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[The undersea line market steams ahead in Africa and Middle East in 2022.]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/undersea-line-market-steams-ahead-in-africa-and-middle-east/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2022 13:29:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=424</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Three major submarine master plans to deliver yet unserved capacity and gain across Africa and the Middle East have been revealed, satisfying surging digital demands regionally, as well as cost-effectively elevation availability to Europe, the Americas, and Southeast Asia.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;EASSy, the km submarine line system covering Africa’s east and south beachfront, is now using Ciena’s GeoMesh Extreme, powered by WaveLogic 5 Extreme coherent optical technology, to increase capacity and performance in sub-Saharan Africa. With the new deployment, EASSy is doubling network capacity from 18Tbps to 36Tbps across the system to maintain pace with edacious and ongoing bandwidth growth.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;By using its ultimate coherent technology, Ciena said EASSy is adding intelligence and effectiveness to its line system, maximizing fiber capacity and substantially reducing the transported cost per bit. The network is managed by Ciena’s Manage, Control, and Plan (MCP) sphere controller. By espousing a software-driven, automated approach, EASSy is said to be suitable to gain maximum functional proficiency and service dexterity while reducing OPEX.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;The uprise is designed to help EASSy satisfy surging digital demands regionally, as well as cost-effectively improve connectivity to Europe, the Americas, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia. EASSy is also using Ciena technology to apply the attack upgrade, including migration of heritage business, as well as to manage and support its network operations <a href="https://allafrica.com/stories/202109230199.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">center (NOC) in South Africa</a>. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>“ There’s a great need for affordable and reliable international connectivity in East Africa,” said Jacques Van Der Walt, procurement group chairman at Telkom South Africa. " We have operated with Ciena to make our submarine line network less astounding and progressed speed, permitting us to measure quite far at a lower normally cost. This places EASSy experiencing the same thing to accelerate the check of the high-level top for Africans who are progressively dependent upon pall-predicated organizations."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;Also, in-African technology group Liquid Intelligent Technologies, a business of Cassava Technologies, has acquired a fiber brace on the Equiano subsea line, allowing it to transport business up to 12 Tbps, bringing an important- demanded increase in international connectivity in Western and Southern Africa. Noting that aged sub- ocean lines are nearly at the end of their continuance, Liquid said the Equiano line system will address the growing need for internet capacity, supporting pall services in both coastal and landlocked countries on the landmass.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;The Equiano subsea line will link Africa to Europe via the West Coast of Africa when it's ready for service subsequently in 2022, aiming to give the Terabit per alternate capacity to meet the growing and varied business conditions of organizations across Europe, Western and Southern Africa. It has levees planned in Sesimbra (Portugal), Lomé (Togo), Lagos (Nigeria), Swakopmund (Namibia), Rupert’s Bay (Saint Helena), and Melkbosstrand (South Africa), with farther stations planned in the future. Through its fiber backbone and satellite services, Liquid is confident that it can offer reliable telecommunications and pall services to further than1.3 billion people across thousands of cosmopolises and cosmopolises in Africa.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>“ In the formerly numerous times, we have witnessed a steady increase in the handover of digital technologies,” <a href="https://www.liquid.tech/about-us/our_team" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">said David Eurin, CEO of Liquid Data harborage</a>."This wouldn't have been imaginable without our interests in high-haste vacuity in the coastal, as well as landlocked, African nations. The central area needs associations like Liquid who not just land Terabit each second of the limit with subsea lines yet also circulate that limit inland, empowering these nations to consider analogous advantages to be those where the line lands."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":427,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large" id="https://techodu.com/"><img src="https://techodu.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Undersea-line-market-steams-ahead-in-Africa-and-Middle-East-2-683x1024.jpg" alt="Undersea-line-market-steams-ahead-in-Africa-and-Middle-East " class="wp-image-427"/><figcaption>It will make the future better</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;For their part, Infinera and telecoms service provider PCCW Global has announced the completion of what they call a significant deployment on the Peace line system between Marseille, Cyprus and Abu Talat. The two enterprises believe network motorists are continually expanding pall-predicated services to produce further connected communities, driving the need for subsea network upgrades encyclopedically. PCCW Global said that by using Infinera’s ICE technology it can now offer network motorists the capability to significantly increase capacity per fiber brace on what are described as critical the Middle East and Mediterranean fiber routes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;By using the GX Series Compact Modular Platform, PCCW Global is confident that it can reach individual wavelength faves of 650Gbs, performing in farther capacity, with the lower attack, and furnishing up to 25 terabits per fibre brace. The combination will enable network motorists to efficiently give high-capacity services between the Middle East and the Mediterranean region.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>“ The Peace line system is the<a href="https://techodu.com/"> topmost- performing</a><a href="https://techodu.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"> </a>open line system connecting Asia, Europe, and Africa,” said Haitham- chairman of EMEA subsea line systems for PCCW Global. with getting together with Infinera to refresh our association part to increase fiber limit, we are appropriate to offer visitors attention driving development that gives the highest level of liability and highest limit fiber support accessible."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;PCCW Global’s capacity upgrade on the Peace line system is one of a series of upgrades planned for this time.</p>

					</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[iPhone-14  Rumors: leaks and what we want to see]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/iphone-14-possible-release-date-and-price-and-biggest-changes-in-years-including-a-possible-end-to-the-notch/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 01 Apr 2022 21:41:37 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=446</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The iPhone-14 could have the biggest changes in years, including a possible end to the notch.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>While we've only recently finished our work, rumors about the iPhone 14 are already running rampant. The iPhone 13 review has come out with the iPhone 13 Pro.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>However, while the new iPhone 13 is only a relatively iterative upgrade over previous generations of iPhones, the iPhone 14 is likely to change more in this regard. In fact, it was Jon Prosser, an Apple informant majoring in the iPhone 14 who broke the news suggesting a major iPhone redesign in 2022; Prosser's track record on leak accuracy is mixed, so take this with a grain of salt Attitude.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;   </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li> iPhone 13 vs. iPhone 13 Pro: The biggest changes</li><li> iPhone 13 pro - 5 reasons I might wait for iPhone 14</li><li>&nbsp;iPhone 14: The 7 biggest upgrades we want to see</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Rumors so far point to a notch, under-display Touch ID, a new 4nm processor and a possible port design for one model. Also, the iPhone mini may disappear in favor of new sizes. We also have our pick of 7 major upgrades we'd like to see from the iPhone 14.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With that in mind, here's what we know about the iPhone 14 so far, and what we expect to see from Apple's 2022 smartphone.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>&nbsp;iPhone 14 possible release date and price</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We've heard about a potential release date for the iPhone 14. But through previous Apple iPhone launch events, we'd expect to see the iPhone 14 begin debuting in September 2022.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As for prices, forecasting is also difficult. But we suspect the iPhone 14 will match the price of the iPhone 13, which is $799 for the iPhone 13 Mini and $899 for the iPhone 13 Pro. However, there may not be an iPhone 14 mini, so we expect the standard iPhone 14 to start at $899.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Don't have an iPhone 14 mini?</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Despite reports of poor iPhone 12 mini sales, Apple has revealed the iPhone 13 mini. But the mini could be the toast later, as the company will report shaking the iPhone 14 lineup in 2022. There could be a larger iPhone 14 Plus or Max that can go with the regular 6.1-inch iPhone 14. So there are also two regular-sized phones and two larger phone screen iPhone 14 models.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This was further confirmed by Prosser, who claimed in a recent video that the iPhone 14 Max will be a replacement for the mini phone. It only offers a 6.7-inch display and doesn't come with a lot of professional features, so it's expensive. Given the demand for bigger phones, a bigger, cheaper iPhone might be just what iPhone fans are looking for.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>iPhone 14 Designs</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":450,"width":817,"height":1022,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large is-resized"><img src="https://techodu.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/iphone-14-techodu-com-8_11zon-819x1024.jpg" alt="iphone-14-possible-release-date" class="wp-image-450" width="817" height="1022"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>According to Jon Prosser</strong> and his <a href="https://techodu.com/tech-news/">Front Page Tech video</a>, the iPhone 14 looks like a cross between the iPhone 12 and the iPhone 4 because it has flat edges. But on those edges, there may be a mute button and a set of circular volume center buttons reminiscent of the iPhone 4.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It has been speculated that the sides of the iPhone14 could be made of titanium, which could make it stronger than previous iPhones, while the back will retain the glass finish but look like a satin finish. Speaking of the edge, there are rumors that the next iPhone will be portless but Prosser claims that the iPhone 14 will continue to use the Lightning port.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>One of the most significant changes to the iPhone14 over its predecessors is the return of the slanted Touch ID. It's just that it won't be integrated into a power button, it should be integrated into the power button embedded under the iPhone 14's display, as many of the best Android phones with fingerprint sensors. Face ID has a hard time identifying iPhone users at a time when people are wearing masks to avoid catching Covid-19, so having a form of <a href="https://screenrant.com/iphone-14-touch-id-fingerprint-recognition-latest/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Touch ID will solve that problem</a>. Another possible design change in the cards for the iPhone 14 is that the rear camera trio will no longer protrude from the rear of the iPhone, but will be flush with the back. Providing the best features in-camera sensor technology and lens manufacturing, this could be a possibility.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Bloomberg's Mark Gurman also commented on the <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/03/27/iphone-14-design-camera-bump/">iPhone 14 leak</a>, claiming that the next Apple phone will have a "completely redesigned" setup, not too far from the iPhone 13. According to Gurman, that's because "Apple's engineers are working on bigger things behind the scenes, which take more time," so we'll see more significant changes in the iPhone 14 than in the iPhone 13. The most notable change will be the eventual removal of the display notch that has been around since the iPhone X; more on that later.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>iPhone-14 display</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":448,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://techodu.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/iphone-14-techodu-com-4_11zon-1024x768.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-448"/><figcaption>Bright and Super fast motion Display</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We expect big changes in the iPhone-14 range, as we'll see the standard iPhone-14 and iPhone-14 Pro with 6.1-inch displays, while the iPhone-14 Plus and iPhone-14 Pro Max will likely feature 6.7-inch displays. So no more 5.4-inch minis.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Given that the iPhone 13 Pro and 13 Pro max have a 120Hz refresh rate, we'd expect all iPhone-14 models to have such screens, likely using LTPO. However, a copy from Heater says that at least one iPhone-14 has an LTPS display, which means a 60Hz panel might stay nearby.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The consistent display seems to fit the iPhone-14 logic of the iPhone 13 to the iPhone-14, but it never translates to the latest iPhone.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>But the most important change in the iPhone-14 is the removal of the display notch. Prosser's leak-based renders effectively claim that the notch will be replaced by a punch-hole front-facing camera. It's easy to imagine since many Android phones use the same method to free up screen space.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>However, this raises the question of where the Face ID sensor will go. There are rumors that Apple will put sensors under the OLED display, but display experts claim that Ross Young has said "under-panel Face ID is not final, but 'it's easier than a panel camera'. There's some chatter that if Apple does use Face ID for the show, it will remain with the iPhone-14 Pro models.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>How Apple would go with a punch-hole camera while still using Face ID without an under-display sensor is still up for debate. Maybe the top edge of the iPhone-14 could be a little larger to accommodate the sensor or use advanced image processing with the selfie camera to avoid infrared scanning. Either way, we'd very much like the current display notch to go down in Apple's design history, since it's already pretty bulky by modern smartphone standards.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>iPhone-14 camera</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":451,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://techodu.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/iphone-14-techodu-com_11zon-683x1024.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-451"/><figcaption>The iPhone-14 will beat every mobile's camera</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We haven't heard much about the iPhone-14's camera so far, but there are some interesting rumors. A report by Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo suggested the iPhone-14's main sensor capacity would be 48MP for the Pro model, which would be a big jump from the 12MP camera on the iPhone 13.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>best telephoto capabilities would also be appreciated, as the iPhone lags behind the likes of the Samsung Galaxy S21. . In fact, it would be pretty awesome if Apple took inspiration from the Galaxy S21 Ultra and opted for a secondary telephoto camera with something like 10x optical zoom.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>An Apple patent points to Apple working on a periscope-style zoom camera that could make its way to the iPhone-14, or at least the Pro models.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>iPhone-14 specs, battery life and charging</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>So far, we've only got a few tidbits about the iPhone-14's specs. We're fairly confident that the 2022 iPhones will use Apple-designed A-series chips. Most likely the A16, is a chip that will almost certainly offer a significant boost in processor and graphics performance compared to the iPhone 13's A15 Bionic.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The iPhone-14 will be powered by a 4nm chip which will be smaller and more efficient than the 5nm A15 Bionic prepared for the iPhone 13.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It's also possible that the iPhone-14 will feature an Apple-Make 5G modem after Apple acquired Intel's modem business. That could give Apple more control over 5G performance and battery life.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4>iPhone-14: What we want to see</h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A fresh new design: Prosser's iPhone-14 renders a rather attractive phone. But it's not a huge jump in Apple's industrial design aesthetic. At a guess, Apple makes some of the most beautiful phones, but we wanted to see if it could push phone design even further; maybe the iPhone-14 range could include a rough iPhone flip foldable phone.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>No ratings: The iPhone-14 can bring smaller displays, and we hope they put up with the fruit. Rumors have it that it could be replaced with a punch hole, but we'd love to see an in-display camera as long as it doesn't affect imaging or Face ID performance.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Touch ID: We're pretty confident that Apple will re-enable Touch ID on the iPhone-14, even if it's not through the display sensor. Maybe the side-mounted power button could integrate a Touch ID sensor, like in the iPad Air.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Smarter features: While Apple A-series chips have always been Powerhouses, we'd like to see Apple leaning more toward the AI side of things, like the Google Pixel 6. Is it going to be a tensor chip? That way, we could have a smarter, more responsive Siri to compete with Google Assistant, as well as smarter features that more intuitively give iPhone-14 users the data or services they want.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The killer camera features: The iPhone 12 Pro Max offers one of the best camera phones around but we'd like to see Apple push its camera technology and hardware further. For now, the Pro Max and similar Google Pixel 5. and Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra are not huge. With the iPhone-14, we'd like to see Apple deliver a camera and phone photography experience that wipes the floor of Android competitors, forcing them to shoot their photography game with their next phone. And getting ahead of Zoom would help.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[What to see when buying a gaming phone]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/what-to-see-when-buying-gaming-phones/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 03 Apr 2022 07:54:46 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=473</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Gaming mobile phones are specially designed for games. In terms of experience, fluency, and heat dissipation when playing games, they are far beyond ordinary mobile phones. This is its biggest advantage. That kind of experience can only be experienced by game enthusiasts.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>1. Processor (CPU</strong>)</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The mobile phone chip is the brain of a mobile phone and is the factor that most affects game performance. The stronger the processor, the higher the fluency and compatibility limit when dealing with complex mobile games. At present, the top-ranked processor of Android phones is Snapdragon 8 Gen1, followed by Snapdragon 888plus and Snapdragon 888. The flagship and mainstream models of major brands are equipped with these processors.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It’s already 2022. In order to pursue the ultimate gaming performance, it is enough to look at the top three CPU models when purchasing gaming phones.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>2. Heat dissipation capacity</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Gaming mobile phones not only need to look at the processor, but the most important factor is the heat dissipation capacity. No matter how good the processor is without a good heat dissipation design, it is equivalent to a paper tiger.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When the mobile phone is playing games, the heat dissipation quality not only affects the fluency of the game, but also affects the player's experience and mood. Professional gaming phones usually pay attention to cooling schemes, such as large-area liquid cooling, graphene cooling, air cooling, fans, etc. The richer and more reasonable the cooling scheme, the better the performance limit and stability of the phone.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Red Magic 6Pro cooling solution example<br>Of course, the heat dissipation design of each brand is different, which will bring different performance. For specific differences, please refer to the evaluation of related models.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>3. Screen</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The mobile phone screen is the most important input channel for human-computer interaction. In order to pursue a better gaming experience and at the same time better respond to the speed of human-computer interaction scenarios, the screen quality requirements of gaming mobile phones are usually much more demanding than that of ordinary mobile phones. In addition, because the gaming phone faces the human eye for a long time, the screen of the gaming phone is usually blessed with technologies such as eye protection and anti-blue light, focusing on the following factors:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Face screen</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br>The flagship phones of major brands generally use curved screens, and the appearance and quality of the phones are better, but the curved screen edges are not conducive to game operation. If you often play games, it is recommended to consider only straight screen phones. Of course, all gaming phones are straight-screen phones, which is enough to prove the importance of the straight screen to the gaming experience.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Screen refresh rate of gaming phones</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br>From a principle point of view, watching videos and playing games on a mobile phone is actually flipping pictures one by one. The higher the screen refresh rate, the less stimulation to the eyes, the better the protection of the eyes, and the smoother we can feel it. Most smartphone screens in 2022 will have a refresh rate of 90hz, and mid-range models and above will be 120hz. Some gaming-grade mobile phones have reached a high refresh rate of 144hz, and gaming phones even support a high refresh rate of 165Hz.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Touch sampling rate of gaming phones</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br>The theoretical introduction of the touch sampling rate is rather obscure and difficult to understand. The intuitive statement is: when your finger touches the screen, the reaction time of the screen following your finger movements can also be called the follow-up rate.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is aimed at the touch <a href="https://benignblog.com/increase-touch-screen-sensitivity-on-smartphone" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">sensitivity of the screen</a>. The faster the touch high rate, the higher the touch sensitivity of the screen. The current touch sampling rate of game phones can reach 500Hz, 600Hz, and 720Hz. The higher the value, the better.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>DC dimming</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br>It is a way of screen dimming. DC dimming can change the brightness of the screen by increasing or decreasing the power of the circuit. This dimming method will hardly cause screen flicker. For gamers who stare at the phone for a long time, the eyes will not be too uncomfortable under PC dimming, reducing eye irritation and fatigue.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When purchasing a mobile phone, support for PC dimming is a big plus.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>4. Memory</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Memory is divided into running memory (RAM) and mobile phone memory (ROM). The main optimization of game mobile phones is running memory to increase the fluency of the game.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:cover {"url":"https://techodu.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/what-to-see-when-buying-a-gaming-phone-2-1024x536.webp","id":477,"dimRatio":50,"style":{"color":{}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__gradient-background has-background-dim"></span><img class="wp-block-cover__image-background wp-image-477" alt="" src="https://techodu.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/what-to-see-when-buying-a-gaming-phone-2-1024x536.webp" data-object-fit="cover"/><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="has-large-font-size">Fast Memory is very <strong>important </strong>for Gaming phones</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is recommended to choose a running memory of 12G or above for gaming mobile phones. 128G of ROM can meet the needs of most players. After all, read-only storage has little effect on the game itself, and you can choose according to the storage space you need.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>5. Battery life and fast charging</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The standby time of gaming mobile phones must be long. Now some mobile phones are equipped with 5000mAh and 6000mAh large batteries; the fast charging capability of mobile phones represents the charging speed, which is also an important factor in the battery life.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>6. Motor</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It belongs to the tactile experience of controlling the mobile phone. Installing a motor on the mobile phone can bring a more realistic vibration and a strong sense of feedback when the user touches the mobile phone. At present, game phones are generally equipped with Z-axis motors, and the game experience is better, which is a plus.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>7. Sound effects</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It belongs to the auditory experience of controlling mobile phones, and some games have high requirements for sound effects, especially real-time<a href="https://techodu.com/next-gen-ipad-pro-with-apple-m2-chip/"> combat games such as eating chicken</a>. Usually, game phones with symmetrical dual speakers, combined with the optimization and tuning of the manufacturer, are quite different in the three-dimensional sense of sound quality.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>8. Shoulder keys</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With the popularity of full-screen displays, there are fewer and fewer physical buttons on flagship phones. Except for the power button and volume button on the side, there are almost no extra buttons. For mobile game players, just relying on the virtual buttons on the screen and playing games on the horizontal screen can often only use the thumbs of the left and right hands to operate the mobile phone, and the experience is far from enough.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Game phones usually add 2 or 4 physical shoulder buttons on the side of the fuselage, and there is a feeling of playing games with a handle, which can also be regarded as a physical plug-in. Mobile phones with solid shoulder buttons are lacking in appearance, and now many new mobile phones have gradually adopted the design of touch shoulder buttons and lift shoulder buttons.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Per</strong>f<strong>ormance tuning and functional design of different brands</strong> <strong>gaming phones</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Although the game phone has little difference in paper parameters, there are many differences in the <a href="https://techodu.com/iphone-14-possible-release-date-and-price-and-biggest-changes-in-years-including-a-possible-end-to-the-notch/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">performance tuning and functional design of different brands.</a> For example, game assistants such as Shasha sauce of Black Shark mobile phone and Red Magic Ji of Red Devil mobile phone; such as the lifting shoulder button of Black Shark mobile phone; for example, the in-depth cooperation between Red Devil mobile phone and Tencent Games, the tuning and stability of Tencent games have been better. , the player experience is stronger.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

			<wp:comment_id>346</wp:comment_id>
			<wp:comment_author><![CDATA[Muhammad Awais]]></wp:comment_author>
			<wp:comment_author_email><![CDATA[awaisdeveloper32@gmail.com]]></wp:comment_author_email>

			<wp:comment_date><![CDATA[2023-03-20 13:52:02]]></wp:comment_date>
			<wp:comment_date_gmt><![CDATA[2023-03-20 08:52:02]]></wp:comment_date_gmt>
			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[https://techodu.com/what-to-see-when-buying-gaming-phones/]]></wp:comment_content>
			<wp:comment_approved><![CDATA[0]]></wp:comment_approved>

					</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Best DSLR Cameras]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/the-best-dslr-camera-recommendations/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 06 Apr 2022 05:53:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=481</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The best DSLRs always outperform point-and-shoots in image quality and performance speed. These advanced cameras allow you to swap lenses to suit different photographic needs, and they offer the ability to fully control the camera exposure manually, which is great for more experienced photographers. So, if you are looking for the best image quality in a digital camera, there is no doubt that you can achieve it with a DSLR.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Without a doubt, the best DSLRs of 2022 represent the hottest segment of the digital camera market. Manufacturers are slowly moving away from the compact camera segment of the market, focusing on top-of-the-line DSLR designs in order to differentiate themselves from the smartphone camera market. Capture amazing videos with our best Canon lenses.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A DSLR is not a necessity for every photographer, mainly due to its high cost and size. Point-and-shoot or compact cameras can be easier to use, less expensive, and also fit in a pocket or purse, better for simple photography needs than larger DSLRs. Still, if the desire for top-notch image quality trumps all other factors, you still need to read our 2022 DSLR camera guide.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Nikon D810 DSLR Camera</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":5} -->
<h5><strong>Why You Need To Go: The best image quality you'll find in a consumer DSLR</strong></h5>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Nikon D810 is one of the best DSLRs on the market right now, offering high-end features at a reasonable price. With a 36.3 MP full-frame image sensor, the D810's image quality is very impressive for a mid-level DSLR. You can shoot in JPEG, RAW or TIFF image format, which gives this model some versatility.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The D810's autofocus system is accurate and fast, and you can shoot in burst mode at 5 to 7 frames per second. The D810's battery life is well above average. Nikon offers photographers quite a few customization options through this model's numerous buttons and dials, which may make the D810 too powerful for some photographers. However, if you have some photography experience and can fit this model on a budget, it will impress you. It can be considered the best travel camera.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Canon EOS Rebel T6i DSLR Camera</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":5} -->
<h5><strong>Why You Need To Go: Inexpensive DSLR cameras deliver well-above-average image quality.</strong></h5>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For over a decade, Canon's Rebel DSLR cameras have been popular among those looking for the first advanced interchangeable lens camera. The Rebel T6i offers some notable improvements over its predecessor, including a 33% higher resolution and faster burst mode performance than the T5i. Canon added built-in Wi-Fi to the T6i, which also has an articulating display. For compact cameras, check out the best compact cameras.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Pentax K-S2 DSLR Pentax Digital SLR Camera</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":5} -->
<h5><strong>Why You Need To Go: The weatherproof coating makes this DSLR a solid and durable product</strong>.</h5>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Pentax may not be as well known as Canon and Nikon, but the established camera maker has a ton of great DSLRs.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Pentax K-S2 offers a weatherproof design that protects it from minor weather issues. It really feels well-built and sturdy, something you don't always find in the lower-priced segment of the DSLR market. It offers an articulating display and can shoot at up to 5.4 frames per second. Compare this to the best digital cameras to see how it stacks up. Remember, not all cameras are the same. The best home security cameras are not the same as DSLRs.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Canon EOS 5Ds DSLR Camera</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:cover {"url":"https://techodu.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/the-best-dslr-camera-recommendations-1024x536.webp","id":484,"dimRatio":50,"minHeight":100,"minHeightUnit":"vh","isDark":false,"style":{"color":{}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover is-light" style="min-height:100vh"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__gradient-background has-background-dim"></span><img class="wp-block-cover__image-background wp-image-484" alt="Why we recommend it: Professionals will appreciate the excellent image quality of this DSLR." src="https://techodu.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/the-best-dslr-camera-recommendations-1024x536.webp" data-object-fit="cover"/><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"base","fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="has-base-color has-text-color has-large-font-size">Why we recommend it: Professionals will appreciate the excellent image quality of this DSLR.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":5} -->
<h5>Even if you have to spend a few thousand dollars on a Canon EOS 5Ds DSLR camera -- and that's only for the body -- you'll get top-notch image quality and the type of camera performance that appeals to advanced photographers. It features both CF and SD memory card slots, a 5-frame-per-second burst mode in RAW image format, and a 61-point autofocus system, all of which will appeal to advanced photographers. If you're new to the DSLR world, the 5D is probably more than a camera you'll want to deal with right now. However, once you have some experience with DSLRs, this Canon model is a great option if you have the budget.</h5>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Visit for: <a href="https://techodu.com/what-to-see-when-buying-gaming-phones/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">https://techodu.com/what-to-see-when-buying-gaming-phones/</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Nikon D3300 DSLR Camera</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":5} -->
<h5><strong>Why You Need To Go: A very versatile entry-level DSLR at a great price.</strong></h5>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Nikon D3300 represents one of Nikon's most basic DSLRs, but it will serve photographers looking for their first DSLR. Nikon gave this model a guide mode that walks you step-by-step through some of the camera's settings, which is a great beginner-level feature. It has an APS-C sized image sensor with a resolution of 24 megapixels, which produces excellent image quality. If you have smaller hands, the D3300 is a good choice, as it's smaller and lighter than most other DSLRs. It would be nice if Nikon had equipped this model with a touchscreen display or built-in Wi-Fi.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Nikon D850</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you're looking for a monster DSLR that can handle just about any shooting situation you can think of, look no further than the Nikon D850. The successor to Nikon's popular D810 boasts 45 megapixels of power, a sturdy magnesium alloy body that's weather-sealed, and compatible with an excellent range of lenses.<br>Released in 850 in 2018, the D20 is a few years old at this point and still produces great images. Its ISO range is reduced to 64 to provide impressive dynamic range, providing crisp images and plenty of room for editing when shooting RAW.<br>The D850's high resolution also makes it ideal for portraiture, but it can be used both in the studio and on location. It has the same large, bright optical viewfinder as the D810, suitable for any type of shooting.<br>That said, if you're just getting started or only plan to take your camera with you on the occasional vacation, you should probably choose something else. The body alone will set you back about $3,000 brand new, or even over $3,000 used.<br>Other DSLRs like the D750 and Canon 6D will be cheaper, more suitable for casual use, and make great full-frame cameras for learners. The D850 isn't Nikon's most advanced video option either, although it still shoots excellent 4K footage.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Nikon D850 is a powerful professional-grade camera that can handle almost any shooting situation.<br>The Canon 6D Mk II is the successor to the company's popular entry-level full-frame DSLR, the 6D. It's packed with pretty much everything that made the original 6D great, with slightly updated tech, and it's great value for money.<br>The 1DII's body sells for $400 and delivers the image quality of a full-frame sensor without breaking the bank. If you want to learn how to shoot in manual mode, but don't want or can't spend the money on a 6D camera, this is the place for you.<br>The 26,2-megapixel sensor paired with the Canon lens makes it easy to get professional images suitable for delivering to clients, social media and even making decent-sized photos. If you're a vlogger or love to take selfies, the 6Dii also features a tilting LCD touchscreen to help you frame your shots.<br>The camera can take six shots per second, which is fast enough for things like travel photography and portraiture. If you want to <a href="https://photographylife.com/what-is-photography" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">shoot sports or wildlife</a>, the EOS 6DII isn't the perfect investment.<br>For video, this camera shoots in 1080p HD using Canon's reliable video codec, which is good enough for things like YouTube or if you're just learning to shoot video. If you're looking for something a little more advanced, you'll want a DSLR designed for shooting video.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
