					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Microsoft uses AI for Health project to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/ai-project-to-fight-the-new-crown-pneumonia-epidemic/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 04 Jun 2022 07:37:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=872</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Microsoft announced the launch of the AI ​​for Health program, dedicated to improving the health of people and communities around the world. The five-year project aims to empower nonprofits, researchers, and organizations through artificial intelligence and data science tools.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The world has changed dramatically since the launch of the project. As of this writing (April 9, 2020), more than 1.4 million people worldwide have been infected with COVID-19. This crisis has brought a painful realization that health knows no borders and affects everyone on the planet.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Given this urgency, we are working hard to advance the AI ​​for Health program, focusing on helping those researchers on the front lines of COVID-19 research. Our work focuses on five specific areas where we believe data, analytics, and the skills of a data scientist can have the greatest impact. We also immediately committed $20 million to this particular program.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This is just part of Microsoft's full-scale efforts to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic - we are fully supporting distance education and empowering students around the world, working to help companies work from home, ensure the supply of needed medical supplies, and provide local communities. provide support. We hope that through these efforts, researchers and organizations will be able to respond to the crisis (AI for Health project to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic).</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>The fight against COVID-19 is well underway, with some of our key collaborations including:</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>The COVID-19 High-Performance Computing Consortium – a public-private partnership led by the White House Office of Science and Technology Policy, Microsoft provides the world’s most powerful computing resources to researchers to help Significantly accelerate the pace of scientific research in the fight against the epidemic. Microsoft researchers are located around the world and span the fields of computer science, biology, medicine, and public health, and they are collaborating on several projects in the consortium.</li><li>The Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation (IHME), a global health research organization, released a set of visualizations and forecasts of COVID-19 data. The White House, Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA), local Governors, and hospital administrators have begun to use the data to mobilize resources.</li><li>The Washington State Department of Health is developing a new dashboard designed to improve the timeliness, accuracy, and speed of reporting data to the public. The dashboard is based on data reported by local health jurisdictions, medical facilities, and laboratories.</li><li>Folding@home, a global organization using distributed computing, is studying the viral protein makeup of COVID-19, which could help develop treatments.</li><li>The Sepsis Center of Excellence in Research (SCORE-UW), affiliated with the University of Washington School of Medicine, is a global collaborative network of hospitals, industry, blood banks, universities and funding partners. Using clinical data, radiographic imaging, and other patient biomarker responses, SCORE-UW is developing new algorithms to predict and improve healthcare and socioeconomic outcomes in COVID-19-positive patients (AI for Health project to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic).</li><li>Take, a market leader in chatbots and smart contacts in Brazil, has developed a bot that can provide the public with official, trusted information and connect potential patients with medical teams, thereby avoiding overloading Brazilian hospitals.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>AI for Health projects focus on the COVID-19 pandemic</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Given the global reach of the outbreak, technology will play a key role in all aspects of the response to the COVID-19 outbreak—from using artificial intelligence to process massive data sets to analyzing disease vectors and determining treatment impact. We will partner with nonprofits, government, and academic researchers to develop solutions and share our valuable experiences, enabling them to leverage Microsoft's AI expertise, seek help from Microsoft technical experts and data scientists, and use other Microsoft resources.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Our support for research efforts related to the fight against COVID-19 will focus on the following five areas:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Data and insights – providing timely information on people’s safety and economic impact</li><li>Therapeutics and Diagnostics – Advancing research on vaccine development, diagnostics and treatment options</li><li>Resource Allocation - Advise on the allocation of limited assets such as hospital space and medical supplies</li><li>Disseminate accurate information—minimize the sharing of misinformation</li><li>Scientific research – to study and understand COVID-19</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>My colleague, Microsoft Chief Science Officer Eric Horvitz summed it up brilliantly: "Data and computing will light the path to 'pandemic mitigation'. We are committed to using our computing resources and expertise in the most promising research directions, including Biomedicine, logistics, epidemiology and public health.”</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Learn about and follow Microsoft's progress against COVID-19</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We want the world to better understand COVID-19. Therefore, we have developed a set of interactive visualizations that are intuitive and transparent. This way, everyone can see the scope of the problem and the progress we are making together to end the outbreak and heal the world (AI for Health project to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic). Microsoft also said we'll continue to update and refine this visualization with new data and insights.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>COVID-19 is a global problem, and finding a solution requires our collective efforts. We are proud to partner with researchers around the world and provide researchers with additional dedicated support through the AI for Health program.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[What is cloud storage?]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/cloud-storage/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 04 Jun 2022 22:45:11 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=876</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Cloud storage is the abstraction, collection, and sharing of storage resources through the Internet. Cloud storage is powered by an IT environment called the "cloud" that enables cloud computing to run workloads in a cloud environment. Access to cloud storage does not require an internal network connection (also known as "network-attached storage") or a direct connection to storage hardware (also known as "direct-attached storage").</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There are three types of cloud storage: private cloud storage, hybrid cloud storage, and public cloud storage. There are also 3 formats suitable for cloud storage: block, file or object. Each format has its pros and cons (blocks are faster, files are easier to understand, objects are best for fast-moving workloads), but some software-defined cloud storage products can combine all 3 formats into an easy-to-deploy unified in the solution.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Many enterprises find that traditional storage methods can become a bottleneck that reduces scalability and agility. This has facilitated the development of containers, with which applications can scale rapidly, become more reliable, and provide better performance than traditional approaches or methods.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>How does cloud storage work?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Data can be manipulated as archived like long-term memory or short-term memory. Short-term memory is handled by random access memory (RAM), which is responsible for processing and remembering all requests and operations that occur while the computer is processing a particular computation (ie, task). After all computations are finished, the relevant data can be stored in long-term memory on dissimilar storage volumes, some of which may have in the cloud.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>However, all cloud storage volumes are storage resources conceptual from physical hardware. Virtual technology is an abstraction that abstracts the need for storage space from more than a dozen unlike servers ( proprietary or commercial). Such virtual storage can all be merged together into so-called data lakes. Users can then allow the data lake as a single repository. If these data are connected to the internet, cloud storage is shaped.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>cloud storage format</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>block storage</strong><br>Block storage splits a single storage volume (such as a cloud storage node) into multiple independent instances called "blocks". It is a fast, low-latency storage system for high-performance workloads.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>object storage</strong><br>Object storage pairs data with unique identifiers for metadata. Since objects are not compressed and encrypted, users can access objects in bulk very quickly, making it suitable for cloud-native applications as well.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>file storage</strong><br>File storage is a primary technology used on NAS systems to organize data and present it to users. Its hierarchical structure allows us to easily browse the data from the top down, but this increases processing time.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Types of cloud storage</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>public cloud storage</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Public cloud storage is data storage in a pool of resources, drawn from hardware not owned by the end user. If you don't own or manage the systems that store your data, you can create security risks. As a result, many enterprises use containers to move workloads and applications between public cloud environments. Persistent storage solutions such as Red Hat OpenShift® Data Foundation prevent stateful applications from failing and losing all their data.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Private cloud storage</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Private cloud storage is data storage in a pool of resources, drawn from resources dedicated to the end user, usually within the user's firewall, and sometimes locally. Manually setting up an enterprise-grade private cloud is less efficient in the long run than using off-the-shelf software, so organizations use platforms such as OpenStack® to digitally transfer pools of virtual resources to the private cloud.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Hybrid cloud storage</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Hybrid cloud storage is data storage in a multi-cloud environment with some degree of workload portability and orchestration and management capabilities. While the public and private cloud environments that make up a hybrid cloud are separate entities, they can be accessed through a network of local area networks (LANs), the wide-area networks (WANs), application programming interfaces (APIs), containers, or virtual private networks (VPNs). Simplify migration operations between these entities. With this independently interconnected architecture, businesses can store data in any environment and move data between environments as needed.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Cloud Storage and Virtual Storage</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Because of the significant difference between cloud computing and virtualization, some businesses prefer virtual storage to cloud storage. This may stem from industry-specific compliance and regulatory guidelines. However, many industries still need to achieve cloud-like storage scalability when using virtual deployments.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For example, institutions that adopt distributed operations, such as the banking industry. Remote branch offices must access traditional networks through four layers: the network layer, the compute layer, the storage layer, and the service area network or NAS. While it would be ideal to have an air-conditioned data center in the basement of the branch, this is not practical due to space and/or staffing constraints. Therefore, some virtual storage solutions, such as Red Hat Hyperconverged Infrastructure, combine 2 storage tiers to simplify the deployment and management of virtual storage.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>why choose Red Hat Cloud products?</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Because we can not only help you deploy your cloud environment, but also increase the productivity of your cloud environment. Whether public, private, hybrid or multi-cloud, our open source technologies provide a unified infrastructure for all cloud deployments.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Why choose Red Hat storage products?</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To address today's storage challenges, many open-minded enterprises have embraced software-defined storage, and we're taking it a step further by open-sourcing it, giving you complete freedom to determine where and how your data is stored.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Email Security]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/email-security/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 05 Jun 2022 20:10:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=879</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>sending e-mail across the Internet or other suspect networks uncovers a system's security risks, even if the system is protected by a firewall.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We must understand these risks to ensure that our security policy describes how to minimize these risks.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Email is like any other form of communication. It is important to exercise judgment before emailing any confidential information. Because the email goes through many systems before it arrives, it is very likely that someone will intercept and read your email. Therefore, you may want to use security measures to protect the confidentiality of your email.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Common Email Security Risks</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Here are some of the risks associated with using email:</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A flood (a denial of service attack) occurs when a system becomes overloaded with multiple email messages. An attacker could easily create a simple program that sends millions of email messages (including empty messages) to a single email server in an attempt to flood that server. Without proper security, the target server could suffer a denial of service attack as its storage disk is filled with useless messages. The system may also stop responding because all system resources are involved in processing mail from the attack source.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Spam (spam email) is another common type of email attack. As the volume of e-commerce services offered over the Internet has grown, we have received a flood of unwanted or unsolicited business emails. This is spam, which is sent to e-mail users on a broad distribution list, filling everyone's e-mail box.<br>Confidentiality is a risk when sending email to another person over the Internet. This email goes through many systems before it reaches the intended recipient. If messages are not encrypted, hackers can intercept and read your emails anywhere in the transmission path.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Email Security Options</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To prevent the risk of flooding and spam, the email server must be properly configured. Most server apps give procedures for dealing with these types of cyber attacks. It is also possible to work with an Internet Service Provider (ISP) to ensure that the ISP provides some additional protection from these attacks.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The additional security measures required depend on the level of confidentiality required and the security features provided by the email application. For example, is it sufficient to keep the content of email messages confidential? Or do you want to keep all information associated with emails (such as source and destination IP addresses) sufficiently confidential?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Some applications have integrated security features that give you the protection you need. For example, Lotus Notes® Domino® provides some integrated security features, including encryption of entire documents or individual fields of documents.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To encrypt mail, Lotus Notes Domino creates unique public and private keys for each user. A message can be encrypted with a private key so that it is readable only by those who have the public key. The public key must be sent to intended message recipients so that they can use the public key to decrypt encrypted messages. If someone else sends you encrypted mail, Lotus Notes Domino will decrypt the message for you using the sender's public key.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Information on using these Notes® encryption features can be found in the program's online help file.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you wish to provide greater confidentiality for e-mail or other information flowing between branch offices, remote clients, or business partners, you have several options.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If the e-mail server application supports Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), it can be used to create a secure communication session between the server and the e-mail client. SSL also provides support for optional client authentication when writing client applications to use SSL. Since the entire session is encrypted, SSL also ensures data integrity during data transmission.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Another option available is to configure a virtual private network (VPN) connection. Various VPN connections can be configured with the system, including connections between remote clients and the system. When using a VPN, all traffic flowing between communication endpoints is encrypted, which ensures data confidentiality and data integrity.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Operating system structure (Integral, Modular, Hierarchy, Microkernel)]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/operating-system-structure/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 07 Jun 2022 08:10:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=883</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The operating system structure refers to the structure of the operating system. In the development process of the operating system, a variety of system structures have been produced, and almost every operating system has its own characteristics a structure. Generally speaking, according to the time of appearance, the operating system structure can be divided into monolithic Structures, modular structures, hierarchical structures, and microkernel structures.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Integral structure </strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The monolithic structure is also called a simple structure or no structure. In the early design and development of the operating system, the designer only focused on the realization of the function and obtaining high efficiency. The functions of the entire operating system are realized by one process, and these processes can call each other, which causes the operating system to become a collection of processes, and its internal structure is complex and chaotic. So such an operating system has no structure to speak of.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The biggest advantage of this early monolithic structure is that the interface is simple and direct, and the system is efficient, but it has many shortcomings: no readability, and no maintainability. Once a problem occurs in a certain process, any call to it exists. The process of the relationship must be modified, so it brings a lot of trouble to the debugging and maintenance personnel. Sometimes it is better to redesign and develop an operating system in order to modify the errors in the system. As a result, this early monolithic structure has become obsolete.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Modular structure</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Modular structure refers to dividing the entire operating system into several modules according to functions, and each module implements a specific function. Communication between modules is only possible through predefined interfaces. In other words, the relationship between modules is limited to the transfer of interface parameters.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In this modular structure, the division of modules is not arbitrary. Instead, a certain principle must be followed, that is, the association between the module and its blocks should be as few as possible, and the association within the module should be as close as possible. The complex calling relationship between modules is reduced, and the structure of the operating system becomes clear: the internal parts of the module are closely connected so that each module has independent functions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Hierarchy</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The so-called hierarchical structure is to arrange all the functional modules of the operating system into several layers according to the function calling order, and the modules between the layers have only a one-way calling relationship (<strong>for example</strong>, only the upper or outer module is allowed to call the lower or inner module).</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>The advantages of layering are:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li> Change the disorder of function realization to order, which can significantly improve the accuracy of the design.</li><li>Change the complex dependencies between modules to one-way dependencies, that is, high-level software depends on low-level software.</li><li>E.W.Dijkstra's THE multiprogramming system published in 1968 was the first to propose a layered approach to operating systems. The whole THE system is divided into 6 layers.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Microkernel structure</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The MicroKernel OS structure was developed in the 1990s. It is based on client and server architecture and adopts object-oriented technology. It can effectively support multiple processors and is very suitable for distributed systems.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The microkernel is a small kernel that can realize OS functions, runs in kernel state, and resides in memory, it is not a complete OS. Just to provide the basis for building a general OS. The basic functions of the microkernel include process management, memory management, inter-process communication, and I/O device management. At this time, the operating system is composed of two parts, namely the kernel running in the kernel mode and the process layer running in the user mode and running in the client and server mode.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to restore your Google Account or Gmail service (After Deleting)]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/how-to-restore-google-account/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 08 Jun 2022 08:10:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=885</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you've forgotten your password/username, or can't get a verification code, follow the steps below to recover your Google Account. That way, you can use services like Gmail, Google Photos, and Google Play.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Tip: If you're using an account from work, school, or another group, the steps below may not apply. Please ask your administrator for help.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>forget password</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Follow the steps on this page to restore your Google Account or Gmail service.<br>They will ask you some questions to confirm that you are the owner of the account. Please be careful to answer these questions.<br>If you're having trouble, try the tips for completing the account recovery steps.<br>Reset your password when prompted. Please choose a strong password that has not been used with this account. Learn how to create strong passwords.<br>Forgot an email address used to log in<br>Follow the steps on this page to retrieve your username. You must know the following information:<br>Mobile number or recovery the email address for the account<br>Full name of the account<br>Follow these instructions to confirm that you are the owner of this account.<br>You will see the list of usernames that match your account.<br>Someone else is using your account<br>If you think your Google Account is being used without your permission, follow the steps to recover your hacked or compromised Google Account or Gmail service.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Can't log in for other reasons<br>If you have additional questions, please click here for help with logging in.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Recover a deleted Google Account<br>If you are recently deleted your Google Account, then you can follow the steps to restore your account.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Still can't log in<br>Create new account<br>If you can not sign in, Then try these tips for account recovery.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you're still unable to recover your account, you can create a new Google Account.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Avoid using account and password recovery services<br>For security reasons, Google will not provide you with account sign-in assistance over the phone. We will not use any services that claim to provide account or password support. Never reveal your password or verification code to anyone.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Supercomputing Techniques explained in minutes]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/supercomputing-techniques/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 09 Jun 2022 18:39:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=887</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Supercomputing:</strong> Throughout the ages, humans have tried to understand the world around them while using tools to adapt and solve problems. As the challenges faced increased, humans began to improve the tools in their hands. Ultra-fast supercomputers eventually replaced earlier stone hammers and were used to solve many of the pressing challenges facing society today. Relevant requirements include:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Protect the natural and environmental resources more effectively<br>Development of new energy and renewable energy<br>Mitigate the effects of climate change<br>Predict natural disasters, such as earthquakes, tsunamis, and storms, and plan accordingly for these increasingly frequent disasters<br>Develop new drugs to treat debilitating diseases.<br>The scale and complexity of the above problems make it difficult to make progress, and traditional ways of solving them are often too expensive or time-consuming. Supercomputers can speed up the solution process.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>It's all about speed</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To put it simply, a supercomputer is a computer that is extremely fast. The K computer, one of the fastest supercomputers in the world, was developed by Fujitsu in cooperation with the Institute of Physics and Chemistry, Japan, under the initiative of the High-Performance Computing Infrastructure Program initiated by the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The K computer can perform 10 trillion calculations per second. Just imagine how fast this is: all seven billion people in the world each use a calculator and are asked to do a calculation every second, 24 hours a day. Then the K computer, the amount of computation performed by all the population in 17 days, takes only 1 second to complete. If an ordinary computer is likened to a snail, then the K computer is a jet plane.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Incredible speed makes supercomputers suitable for intensive computing and simulation computing. Specific simulation applications include events such as car accidents, earthquakes, and tsunamis. In the process of simulating these, supercomputers need to process massive amounts of data with outstanding computing power.<br>speed race<br>Globally, many countries are competing to see who can develop the world's fastest supercomputer. Behind it is the desire to conduct in-depth research in various advanced fields. But it's not just R&amp;D that benefits from supercomputers. With enhanced safety, design performance and environmental performance, supercomputers will bring innovation across a variety of industries. In addition, a world-leading HPC development environment attracts top-notch scientists and encourages a culture of innovation. This, on the other hand, can improve standard research and even enhance the competitiveness of an entire country (using research results to guide industrial innovation). Supercomputers are like Formula 1 in this regard - companies attract the best drivers with the fastest vehicles, and eventually the associated technology can be used in commercial and passenger cars.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Overcoming current challenges through computing<br>The CPU is the heart of every computer and is also the central processing unit. A normal computer has only one CPU. By comparison, the K computer was equipped with over 80,000 CPUs. These CPUs are designed for high performance, high reliability and low power consumption. But the CPU is only part of the whole. Equally important is the use of ultra-high-speed interconnect technology to connect all processors and transfer data between them. The innovative K computer internetwork uses a total of 200,000 cables and can extend over 1,200 kilometers. These cables are managed by the LSI Interconnect Controller.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>High-performance CPUs and innovative networking technology played a key role in the K computer's emergence as the fastest computer in the world today. The Japanese government plans to make the K computer widely available to customers and research institutions. The computer will be used to support and accelerate the search for viable solutions to today's climate and environmental challenges, and to advance cutting-edge research and industry innovation that will ultimately make the world a safer place.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_metadesc]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Supercomputing: As the challenges faced increased, humans began to improve the tools in their hands. Ultra-fast supercomputers eventually...]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_linkdex]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[30]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Microsoft's "strange trick" is to cool data centers with boiling liquid. This is Quincy, Washington, USA.]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/microsofts-strange-trick-is-to-cool-data-centers/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 10 Jun 2022 15:31:29 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=890</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong> Microsoft's "strange trick" is to cool data centers:</strong> Here, huge volumes of mail and messages travel to and from Microsoft employees. And in a data center on the east bank of the Columbia River, the data boils in steel tanks containing computer servers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Unlike water, the liquid in this couch-shaped tank is not harmful to electronics and is designed to have a boiling point of about 122 degrees Fahrenheit, which is 90 degrees Fahrenheit lower than the boiling point of water.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Heat is dissipated from a running computer processor due to the boiling effect of the server's operating temperature. Low-temperature boiling allows servers to run continuously at full power, avoiding failures due to overheating.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Inside the tank, the steam from the boiling liquid rises until the air-cooled condenser, which touches the tank, becomes liquid. Immediately afterward, this "rainwater" flows back into the immersion server, forming a closed-loop cooling system.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Microsoft's "strange trick": "Microsoft is the first cloud service to use two-phase immersion cooling in a production environment," said Husam Alissa, a principal hardware engineer on the Advanced Development Team in Microsoft's data centers, based in Redmond, Washington, USA. provider."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ioannis Manousakis (left), Principal Software Engineer, Azure, and Husam Alissa (right), Principal Hardware Engineer, Microsoft Data Center Advanced Development Team, inspecting the two-phase immersion cooling tank at Microsoft's data center. (Microsoft's "strange trick")</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Moore's Law in the Data Center</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The next step in Microsoft's long-term plan is to deploy two-phase immersion cooling in production environments to meet the demand for faster, more powerful data center computers, amid a steady slowdown in air-cooling technology for computer chips.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Chip technology has continued to improve over the decades, thanks to an increase in the number of transistors that can fit on a chip of the same size, and the speed of computer processors has doubled almost every two years without increasing power consumption. (Microsoft's "strange trick")</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This phenomenon is called "Moore's Law," named after Intel co-founder Gordon Moore. Gordon Moore observed this trend in 1965 and predicted it would continue for at least 10 years. Moore's Law has been proven over the past few decades, but now, the trend has begun to slow.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This is because the width of transistors has shrunk down to the atomic level and is about to reach the physical limit. "At the same time, the demand for faster computer processors is accelerating for high-performance applications such as artificial intelligence," Alissa said.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To meet performance demands, the computer industry has turned to chip architectures that can handle higher electrical power. For example, power in central processing units (CPUs) has increased from 150 watts per chip to over 300 watts; graphics processing units (GPUs) have increased to over 700 watts per chip.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The higher the electrical power of these processors, the higher the temperature of the chip itself, which is prone to failure, which puts forward higher requirements for cooling effect.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Christian Belady, who is based in Redmond and currently serves as a Distinguished Engineer and Vice President of Microsoft's(Microsoft's "strange trick") Data Center Advanced Development Team, said: "Air cooling is no longer enough. So we introduced immersion cooling technology, which directly lowers the surface of the chip. temperature."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em>He emphasized that heat transfer is orders of magnitude more efficient in liquids than in air. </em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em>He also added that the shift to liquid cooling has brought Moore's Law-like mindset to the entire data center. </em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em>He pointed out: "Liquid cooling allows us to improve the cooling effect, improve the integration of chips, and realize the continuation of Moore's Law trends at the data center level."</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The picture shows Christian Belady, Distinguished Engineer and Vice President of the Data Center Advanced Development Team at Microsoft, next to a two-phase immersion cooling tank in a Microsoft data center</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Pictured is Christian Belady, Distinguished Engineer and Vice President of the Data Center Advanced Development Team at Microsoft</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Next to a two-phase immersion cooling tank in a Microsoft data center(Microsoft's "strange trick")</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>A lesson from a cryptocurrency miner</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Belady points out that liquid cooling is a mature technology. Most cars on the road today rely on it to keep their engines from overheating. Several tech companies, including Microsoft, are also experimenting with cold-plate technology, which cools servers by passing a liquid through a metal plate and then feeding it to a server.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Practitioners in the cryptocurrency industry have pioneered the use of liquid immersion cooling in computing equipment to cool chips that record digital currency transactions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Microsoft looked at how liquid immersion technology would perform as a cooling solution for high-performance applications such as artificial intelligence. The results show that two-phase immersion cooling can reduce the power consumption of any given server by 5% to 15%.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Driven by this result, the Microsoft team worked with a data center IT systems manufacturer and designer Wiwynn to develop a two-phase immersion cooling solution. The first solution is now running in Microsoft's <strong><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quincy,_M.E." target="_blank" aria-label="Quincy (opens in a new tab)" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="ek-link">Quincy</a></strong>, Washington data center.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The sofa-shaped tank is filled with 3M engineering fluids. 3M's liquid cooling fluids have dielectric properties that make them effective insulators. When the server is completely submerged in such liquids, it can still function normally.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This shift to two-phase liquid immersion cooling technology provides greater flexibility for efficiently managing cloud resources, said Marcus Fontoura, Azure Chief Architect, Microsoft Technical Fellow and Vice President.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For example, software that manages cloud resources can allocate sudden spikes in data center computing demands to servers in liquid-cooled storage tanks. This is because these servers can run at higher power without risking overheating, a process also known as overclocking.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Fontoura points out: “For example, we know that Teams usage peaks at 1 or 2, and typically people join meetings at the same time during this time period, and immersion cooling provides us with the ability to handle these burst loads. more flexibility.”</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Boiling liquid removes heat generated by computer servers in Microsoft's data center Microsoft is the first cloud service provider to use two-phase immersion cooling technology in a production environment</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Boiling liquid removes heat from computer servers in Microsoft's data center</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Microsoft is the first cloud service provider to use two-phase immersion cooling technology in production environments</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Sustainable Data Center</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Adding two-phase immersion cooling servers to existing computing resources also enables machine learning software to more efficiently manage resources across the data center, including power, cooling and technical maintenance staff, Fontoura added.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><em><strong>"Not only will we have a big improvement in efficiency, but we will also have a huge effect on sustainability. Each piece of IT equipment we deploy will be fully used without any waste,"</strong> </em>he emphasizes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Liquid cooling is also a waterless technology, which will help Microsoft deliver on its promise to replenish more water than its global operations consume by 2030.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Cooling coils running through the tank allow the steam to condense and connect to a separate closed-loop system that uses fluid to transfer heat from inside the tank to a dry cooler outside the tank, Alissa said. Since the fluid temperature in these coils is always higher than the ambient air temperature, there is no need to spray water to condition the air for evaporative cooling.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>At the same time, Microsoft is working with partners in the infrastructure industry on how to operate the tank in a way that reduces fluid loss and has little impact on the environment.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ioannis Manousakis, Principal Software Engineer at Azure, said: "When done right, two-phase immersion cooling will meet all of our cost, reliability and performance requirements at the same time with very little power consumption compared to air cooling."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The picture shows the Microsoft team is working on two-phase immersion cooling technology. From left to right: Dave Starkenburg, Data Center Operations Management, Christian Belady, Distinguished Engineer and Vice President, Microsoft Data Center Advanced Development Team, Ioannis Manousakis, Principal Software Engineer, Azure, and Husam Alissa, Principal Hardware Engineer, Microsoft Data Center Advanced Development Team</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The picture shows the Microsoft team is working on two-phase immersion cooling technology. From left to right: Dave Starkenburg, Data Center Operations Management, Christian Belady, Distinguished Engineer and Vice President, Microsoft Data Center Advanced Development Team, Ioannis Manousakis, Principal Software Engineer, Azure, and Husam Alissa, Principal Hardware Engineer, Microsoft Data Center Advanced Development Team</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>"We allow our servers to enjoy the deep sea experience"</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The research into two-phase immersion cooling technology is part of Microsoft's multi-pronged strategy to make the construction, operation, and maintenance of data centers more sustainable and efficient.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For example, the data center advanced development team is also exploring the possibility of using hydrogen fuel cells instead of diesel generators as backup power generation in the data center.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The liquid cooling project is similar to the Natick project exploring the possibility of an underwater data center that can be deployed quickly and can be sealed on the seabed like an underwater pipeline to operate for years without any on-site maintenance.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Subsea data centers are no longer filled with engineering fluids, replaced by dry nitrogen. The servers are cooled by fans and a system of heat exchange ducts that pump seawater in through sealed pipes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A key finding from Project Natick showed that subsea servers had one-eighth the failure rate of the same servers in land-based data centers. Preliminary analysis shows that low oxygen corrosion and low humidity are the main reasons for the superior achievement of underwater servers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>According to Alissa's projections, the servers in the liquid-intrusive tanks will have similarly superior performance. "We make it achievable to have a 'deep-sea experience' without having to place servers underwater," he told.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ioannis Manousakis, the principal software engineer at Azure, is pictured as he removes a blade server from a two-phase immersion cooling tank in a Microsoft data center. (Photo by Gene Twedt for Microsoft)</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ioannis Manousakis, the principal software engineer at Azure, is pictured as he removes a blade server from a two-phase immersion cooling tank in a Microsoft data center. (Photo by Gene Twedt for Microsoft).</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Looking to the future</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If the failure rate of servers in the immersion tank decreases as expected, Microsoft could move to a model that doesn't require immediate component replacement in the event of a failure. Not only does this control steam loss, but it also allows the tank to be deployed in remote and difficult service locations.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In addition, Belady noted that being able to pack servers densely in a slot would allow the server's architecture to be reimagined and optimized for low-latency, high-performance applications, and low-maintenance operations.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p> For example, such troughs could be deployed under 5G cellular towers in urban centers for applications such as autonomous car driving.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>So far, Microsoft has only one pod running work-loads in hyperscale data centers. Over the next some months, the Microsoft team will conduct a series of tests to demonstrate the viability of the tank and the technology.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><p>"The first stage is receiving people to believe the logic and prove that we can execute production workloads," Belady said.</p><cite>Belady said</cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>About Microsoft Corporation</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Microsoft (Nasdaq-listed "MSFT") is committed to digital transformation in the era of " Intelligent Edge and Intelligent Cloud ", empowering every person and every organization in the world to achieve massive results.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Anti-theft alarm system(Application, Development)]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/anti-theft-alarm-system/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 11 Jun 2022 12:37:46 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=893</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The equipment of the anti-theft alarm system is generally divided into: front-end detectors and alarm controllers. The alarm controller is a host (like the host of a computer), which is used to control the processing of wired/wireless signals, the detection of faults in the system itself, the power supply, signal input, signal output, built-in dialer, etc. An alarm controller is essential in an anti-theft alarm system. Front-end detectors include a door magnetic switch, glass breakage detector, infrared detector and infrared/microwave dual detector, and emergency call button.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Application Status</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The use of products is more stable and reliable, such as improving the performance of anti-damage, anti-lightning surge, anti-interference, etc.; adding more functions to facilitate installation, debugging and use, such as adjustable frequency of the detector, setting detection area, anti-blocking, Anti-sabotage, wireless connection between the detector and the host, etc.; more convenient installation and debugging, using wireless connection between the detector and the host, simplifying the installation and construction workload, and adapting to the needs of various home users; </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Developing towards a more intelligent direction, such as increasing Area management, voice reminder, biometric identification technology arming and disarming, alarm automatic sending MMS pictures, remote control and other technologies; more networking methods, such as extending from the previous single <a href="https://techodu.com/network-architectures/" target="_blank" aria-label="telephone networking to IP network networking, wireless GSM/GPRS Networking, VPN dedicated line networking,  (opens in a new tab)" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="ek-link">telephone networking to IP network networking, wireless GSM/GPRS Networking, VPN dedicated line networking, </a>etc.; through network encryption technology, data can be more secure, and through the master-slave backup function between wired and wireless, the transmission of police information is faster and more reliable; more powerful integration and expansion It can realize the coordination and unity of various systems, make the alarm security more automatic and intelligent, and further improve the security protection.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Development direction</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Manufacturers of alarm system equipment should improve the ease of use of the equipment: it is simplified to be as easy to use as everyday household appliances. Users only need to set the position of the detector, and the program will set the corresponding professional programming settings; adding voice navigation function, you can Can know how to set up and use the system to facilitate the operation and use of various groups of people; improve the professional level of system design and construction and installation personnel: eliminate the abnormal phenomenon of the system caused by the discomfort of product design and selection and the incorrect installation position of the equipment; improve the product quality. The level of after-sales service, such as the centralized organization of user training; let users understand some principles of the anti-theft alarm system, and reduce false alarms caused by improper use.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Role </strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The anti-theft alarm system refers to a device that causes an alarm when illegally intruding into the prevention area. It is used to signal a dangerous situation. The burglar alarm system uses detectors to arm important locations and areas inside and outside the building. It can detect illegal intrusion in time, and when it detects illegal intrusion, it can warn the relevant personnel in time. For example, magnetic door switches, glass breaking alarms, etc. can effectively detect foreign intrusions, and infrared detectors can sense the activities of people in the building. Once an intrusion occurs, the time and location of the intrusion can be recorded in time, and an alarm signal is issued through the alarm device.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Composition</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Perimeter defense alarm system</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The first security line of defense: It consists of perimeter prevention and alarm system to prevent illegal intruders from entering the community over the fence and surrounding areas. Use inductive cables or active infrared reflectors.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Community Monitoring System</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The second security line of defense: It is composed of a community monitoring system, which monitors and manages vehicles, personnel, and key facilities entering and leaving the community and on main passages. Cooperate with the community alarm system and perimeter protection system to monitor and record on-site conditions to improve the efficiency of alarm response.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Patrol Management System</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The third security line of defense: It consists of a security patrol management system, and the security guards in the residential area supervise suspicious persons and events in the residential area. Cooperate with the electronic patrol system to ensure that the patrols of the security personnel are in place and realize the strict management of the community property.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Video intercom system</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The fourth security line of defense: It is composed of a networked building and apartment visual intercom system, which can keep idle and miscellaneous personnel out of the stairs and prevent outsiders from wandering around.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Detector system</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The fifth security line of defense: It is composed of the home burglar alarm system, which is also the most important and the last link of the entire security system network. When a thief illegally invades a household or emergencies such as gas leaks, fires, and emergencies of the elderly occur, the alarm will be automatically issued through various electronic detectors installed indoors. This quickly dispatched security or ambulance personnel to the resident's scene to deal with it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>System composition</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As the last and most important line of defense of the community security system, the home anti-theft alarm system uses fully automatic anti-theft electronic equipment to judge illegal intrusion or illegal intrusion through electronic infrared detection technology and various types of magnetic switches in unattended places. All kinds of gas leakage, through the control box horn or alarm lights on-site alarm, and at the same time, the alarm information is transmitted to the alarm center or the owner himself through the shared telephone network. At the same time, when an emergency happens to someone at home, emergency information can also be sent to the community networking center and the owner through various wired and wireless emergency buttons or keyboards.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Anti-theft alarm host</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is judged to receive the alarm signals from various detectors. After receiving the alarm signals, it can alarm according to the preset alarm mode. For example, starting the sound and light alarm, automatically dialing the set multiple groups of alarm telephones, and if it is connected to the community alarm center, the signal can be transmitted to the community alarm center. The alarm host is equipped with a remote control, which can remotely control the host.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Infrared Burglar Detector</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Using microcomputer digital signal technology, high stability detection device, innovative design. It has temperature compensation, anti-strong white light, anti-electromagnetic interference, and eliminates a variety of false alarm factors. When the intruder passes through the infrared detector, the infrared detector will send a signal to the alarm host, and the alarm host will alarm immediately.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Door and window magnetic detectors</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>After the alarm host is fortified, the intruder opens the doors and windows installed with door magnets and window magnets, that is, the door magnets and window magnets send a signal to the alarm host, and the alarm host starts the alarm immediately.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Remote control</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is used to arm and disarm the anti-theft alarm system, and the usage method is the same as that of the common car anti-theft remote control.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Smoke Detectors</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Using an advanced radioactive source, contrast space, and open space to detect heavy ions radioactively, whether it is open flame, no fire, smoke, or smokeless combustion, it is more sensitive. When harmful gas is detected, the indicator light is red, and an alarm signal is sent to the host.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Hazardous Gas Detector</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Detection range: methane, ethane, liquefied petroleum gas and other combustible gases Detection detection concentration: methane, propane, ethane greater than 10000PPM, alcohol, acetate greater than 1000PPM, ethylene, ammonia greater than 500PPM Working environment temperature: -10℃～ 5℃ Humidity: less than 95%.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Function</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The intelligence of the security industry has become an important development trend. Intelligence is actually adding the functions of intelligent analysis and response and intelligent control to the process of ordinary monitoring and alarming. Intelligence can make the anti-theft alarm system work more efficiently and make users more worry-free.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The wireless forwarding alarm function of anti-vandalism and anti-cutting is in the market except that the GSM global mobile alarm host can not use the fixed telephone line, other alarm hosts need to use the city's inherent telephone communication line, then there is a hidden danger of anti-theft alarm. , What if the telephone line is cut or the telephone line fails? The wireless forwarding function of the alarm host came into being, which solved the problem of the normal operation of the alarm host after the telephone line was damaged.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Taking the wireless alarm host as an example, in the fortified state, the alarm host is set with the wireless forwarding function. When the telephone line is cut or the telephone line is faulty, the host will immediately start the wireless forwarding function, and immediately transmit the originally set alarm phone wirelessly. To another alarm host, the other host immediately dials the alarm phone, realizes the alarm function of disconnection and self-service, and ensures that the anti-theft alarm is foolproof.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Intelligent learning function</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Crystal shield anti-theft alarm system JD-X503<br>The biggest trouble of the perimeter defense system is that it is easily affected by the outdoor environment, and it is prone to false alarms and false alarms, especially when a storm comes, or when a vehicle vibrates, or when an aircraft takes off or landed, it often leads to false and false alarms. Some perimeter defense systems have developed an intelligent learning function. It learns and memorizes environmental states through "self-learning" technology, so that when it is officially running, similar environmental states can be shielded, such as false alarms caused by wind, Things with obvious features, such as rain and small animal activities, can be automatically "deleted", so that the detection of real intrusion signals can achieve the optimal effect; a fiber-optic technology to the end.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As we all know, the previous optical fiber perimeter defense system used one fiber optic cable for each defense zone. The biggest disadvantage of this kind of system is the large amount of optical fiber engineering, and the optical fiber signal feedback system launched by Ningbo Nuo can realize that only one optical fiber is laid from the perimeter head to the perimeter tail, and when an intrusion event occurs at a certain position along the optical fiber laying line , its back-end control platform can accurately detect the location of the intrusion point, the system not only saves the amount of optical fiber wiring, but also saves the cost of manpower and material resources for checking the precise location of the intrusion.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Magnetic door switch</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The door magnetic switch is composed of a dry reed switch and a magnetic strip, which can be divided into wired/wireless door magnetic. Generally used in doors and windows. As long as the distance between the magnetic strip and the reed switch is less than 20mm, there will be an alarm signal output.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Glass break detector</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The glass breakage detector uses the piezoelectric effect of the piezoelectric ceramic sheet (the piezoelectric ceramic sheet will generate charges on its surface when it is twisted and deformed under the action of external force), and can be made into a glass breakage intrusion detector. It can effectively detect the high-frequency glass breaking sound (10k~15kHZ), and has a strong inhibitory effect on the sound signal below 10kHZ (such as talking and walking). The frequency and intensity of the acoustic emission of glass breakage are related to the thickness and area of ​​the glass. Glass breakage detectors are roughly divided into two categories according to their working principles: one is a single-technology sound-controlled glass breakage detector, which is actually a special-purpose ( A voice-activated alarm detector that can drive out the high-frequency signal generated when the glass is broken. Another category is the dual-technology glass breakage detector, which includes a voice-activated-vibration type and an infrasonic-glass-break high-frequency sound type. It is generally suitable for ATM machines in banks, and other glass is anti-destructive.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Infrared Detectors</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Infrared detector is a kind of radiant energy converter, which is mainly used to convert the received infrared radiant energy into other forms of energy such as electric energy, thermal energy, etc. which are convenient for measurement or observation. According to the energy conversion method, infrared detectors can be divided into thermal detection There are two types of detectors and photon detectors.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The working mechanism of thermal detectors is based on the change of a certain electrical property of the detector caused by the thermal effect of incident radiation, while the photon detector is based on the photoelectric effect generated by the interaction between the incident photon flow and the detection material. The specific performance is the change in the number of free carriers (ie electrons and/or holes) in the response of the detector. Since this change is caused by the change in the number of incident photons, the response of the photon detector is proportional to the number of absorbed photons. The response of the heat detector is proportional to the energy absorbed.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Heat detector</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Crystal shield MMS alarm all-in-one machine<br>The energy conversion process of thermal detectors includes: thermal resistance effect, thermovoltaic effect, thermopneumatic effect and pyroelectric effect. The energy conversion process of photon detectors includes: photovoltaic effect, photoconductive effect, photoelectromagnetic effect and light emission effect<br>The double or triple mirrors have microwave and intelligent anti-pet functions respectively.<br>They are also widely used, such as infrared alarms installed indoors, as long as there are people or moving objects, it will output signals.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Emergency button</strong><br>Emergency button: It is the simplest kind of equipment among anti-theft equipment, it is a switch. There is a normally open/closed output, and it will output an alarm signal to the host when there is a switch value change.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Alarm indicator</strong><br>Alarm indicator light: It is an output device. When the alarm host processes an output with an alarm signal to be processed, the connected alarm indicator light will work.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Audible alarm</strong><br>When the alarm host receives the alarm signal, it will output through the sound and light alarm, and the sound and light alarm will flash and beep at the same time.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
