							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[What is data science?]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/data-science/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 13 Jun 2022 17:26:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=897</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Data Science: Today Techodu will talk about Data Science.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Definition of Data Science</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Data science involves the fields of statistics, scientific method, <a href="https://techodu.com/ai-operative-definition/" target="_blank" aria-label="artificial intelligence (AI) (opens in a new tab)" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="ek-link">artificial intelligence (AI)</a>, and data analysis, and aims to extract value from data. People who apply data science in practice are called data scientists, and they use a combination of skills to analyze data collected from the web, smartphones, customers, sensors, and other sources for actionable insights.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Data science processes include the process of preparing data for analysis, including cleaning, aggregating, and populating data to perform advanced data analysis. Data scientists can then view the results through analytics applications to uncover patterns in the data that help business leaders gain informed insights.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Data Science:</strong> Machine Learning Resources to Be Developed<br>Data science (DS) is one of the most exciting fields today. Why is it so important?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Because businesses are sitting on massive amounts of data. With the development of modern technology, more and more information is created and stored, and the amount of data has also exploded. It is estimated that 90% of the world's data was created in the past two years. For example, Facebook users upload ten (10) million photos every hour.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>However, this data is often just located in databases and data lakes and is largely underutilized.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The vast amount of data collected and stored through technology can bring transformative benefits to organizations and societies around the world, but only if we can interpret it. This is what data science is all about.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Data science uncovers trends and generates insights that businesses can use to make better decisions and launch more innovative products and services. Most importantly, data science enables <a href="https://techodu.com/classification-of-machine-learning/" target="_blank" aria-label="machine learning (opens in a new tab)" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="ek-link">machine learning</a> (ML) models to learn from the vast amounts of data collected, rather than relying on business analysts to manually see what they can discover from the data.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Data is the cornerstone of innovation, but the value of data can only be realized if data scientists can gather information from data and then act on it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What is the difference between data science, artificial intelligence, and machine learning?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To gain a deeper understanding of data science and how to leverage it, it is equally important to understand other terms related to the field, such as artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. You'll find that these terms are often used interchangeably, but there are still some nuances.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>The simple distinction is as follows:</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>AI refers to making computers mimic certain human behaviors.<br>Data science is a subset of AI that refers more to the overlapping fields of statistics, scientific method, and data analysis (all used to extract meaningful insights from data).<br>Machine learning is also a subset of AI that uses a variety of techniques to enable computers to gain insights from data and deliver AI applications.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>To distinguish better, we will introduce another definition.</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Deep learning ( DL) is a subgroup of machine learning (ML) that enables computers to solve more complex problems</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>How data science is revolutionizing business models</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Businesses are using data science to improve products and services, turning data into a competitive advantage. <strong>machine learning and Data science use cases include:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Analyze data collected from call centers to determine churn so marketing can take action to retain customers.</li><li>Improve efficiency by analyzing traffic patterns, weather conditions and other factors, helping logistics companies speed up deliveries and reduce costs.</li><li>Analyzing medical test data and reporting symptoms to improve patient diagnosis and help physicians diagnose disease earlier and treat it more effectively.</li><li>Optimize supply chains by predicting equipment downtime.</li><li>Detect fraud in financial services, including identifying suspicious and unusual behavior.</li><li>Improve sales performance by providing recommendations to customers based on their purchase history.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Many companies make data science a top priority and invest heavily in it. In a recent Gartner survey of more than 3,000 CIOs, respondents unanimously rated analytics and business intelligence as the technologies that best differentiate their organizations. Interviewed CIOs see these technologies as strategic to their companies and invest accordingly.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>How data science is performed</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The data analysis and processing flow is iterative, not linear, but this is the typical data science life cycle flow in a data modeling project:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Planning:</strong> Define the project and its potential outcomes.</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Building data models</strong>: Data scientists often use various open-source libraries or in-database tools to build machine learning models. In general, users want to use APIs to support data ingestion, data profiling, visualization, or functional design. They need the right tools to access the right data and other resources like computing power.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Evaluate the model:</strong> Before deploying a model, data scientists must ensure that the model is highly accurate. Model evaluation typically generates a comprehensive set of evaluation metrics, visualized, and then measures model performance against new data, ranking it on an ongoing basis for optimal production behavior. In addition to raw performance, model evaluation takes into account expected baseline behavior.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Explaining Models: </strong>While it is not always feasible to explain the internal mechanisms of machine learning model results in human language, its importance is growing. Data scientists want the system to automatically account for the relative weights and importance of the factors that generated the predictions, as well as the specific model interpretation details of the model's predictions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Deploying the model:</strong> Taking a trained machine learning model and putting it into a suitable system is often a difficult and laborious process. This can be made easier by manipulating the model as an extensible and secure API or by using an in-database machine learning model.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Monitor Model:</strong> Unfortunately, the deployment model is not the end of the process. Models also need to be monitored after they are deployed to ensure they are functioning properly. After a period of time, the data used to train the model will no longer be suitable for future predictions. Take fraud detection as an example, criminals will always come up with new ways to hack accounts.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Data Science Tools</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Building, evaluating, deploying, and monitoring machine learning models is a complex process. To deal with these complexities, data science tools are increasingly available. Among the many tools used by data scientists, one of the most common is <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source" target="_blank" aria-label="open-source (opens in a new tab)" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="ek-link">open-source</a> notebooks. It's a web app for writing and running code, visualizing data, and viewing results, all within the same environment.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Some of the mainstream notebook tools mainly include Jupyter, RStudio, and Zeppelin. Notebook tools, while very useful in performing analysis, have certain limitations in enabling data scientists to collaborate in teams. The emergence of data science platforms solves this problem.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To decide which data science tool is best for you, start by answering the following questions: What language do your data scientists speak? What kind of work methods do they prefer? What data source do they use?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For example, some users prefer to use open-source library-based, data-source-agnostic services. Others prefer faster in-database machine learning algorithms.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Who will oversee the data science process?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In most organizations, data science projects are typically overseen by three categories of managers:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Business Manager</strong>: Business managers work with the data science team to define problems and develop analytical strategies. They might be line-of-business leaders such as marketing, finance, or sales, to whom the data science team needs to report. They work closely with the data science team and IT managers to ensure project delivery.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>IT Managers: </strong>Senior IT managers are responsible for the infrastructure and architecture design to support data science operations. They continuously monitor operations and resource utilization to ensure the data science team is operating efficiently and securely. Additionally, they may be responsible for building and updating the IT environment for the data science team.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Data Science Manager: A data science manager oversees a data science team and its day-to-day work. They are team builders, able to balance team development with project planning and monitoring.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>But in this process, data scientists are the protagonists.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What is a data scientist?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As a profession, data science is still young. It originated from the fields of statistical analysis and data mining. The Journal of Data Science was first published in 2002 by the International Scientific Council: Council on Data for Science and Technology. In 2008, the title "Data Scientist" came into existence, and the field of data science grew rapidly. Since then, while more colleges and universities have started offering data science degrees, there has been a shortage of data scientists.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Data scientists' responsibilities include developing data analysis strategies; preparing data for analysis; exploring, analyzing, and visualizing data; building models from data using programming languages ​​such as Python and R; and deploying models into applications.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The job of a data scientist is not independent. In fact, the most effective data science is done in teams. In addition to data scientists, the team may include business analysts responsible for defining the problem, data engineers responsible for preparing the data and determining how it will be accessed, IT architects responsible for basic processes and infrastructure, and deploying models or analysis results to applications and application developers in products.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Challenges of implementing data science projects<br>While many businesses see the promise of data science and invest heavily in data science teams, they don't realize the full value of data. In the competition for talent acquisition and data science project creation, some companies have adopted inefficient team workflows. Different people use different tools and processes to work together efficiently. Without tighter, more centralized management, executives may not reap the full return on their investment.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>This chaotic environment presents a lot of challenges.</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Data scientists cannot work effectively. Because access to data is authorized by IT administrators, data scientists often wait long periods of time to get the data and resources they need to analyze. After gaining access, data science teams may use multiple incompatible tools to analyze the data. For example, a data scientist might develop a model in R, but the application that uses the model is written in another language. This is why it can take weeks or even months to deploy a model into a working application.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>App developers don't have access to machine learning available. Sometimes, developers receive machine learning models that cannot be deployed directly into applications. Also, application developers need to address scalability issues because access points are not flexible enough to deploy models in all scenarios.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>IT administrators spend too much time on support. Due to the proliferation of open source tools, IT needs to support more and more tools. For example, data scientists on a marketing team and a finance team might use different tools. Different teams may also have different workflows, which means that the IT team must constantly rebuild and update the environment.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Business managers are disconnected from data science. Data science workflows are not always integrated into business decision-making processes and systems, making it difficult for business managers to fully collaborate with data scientists. If the integration is poor, business managers will have a hard time understanding why it takes so long to go from prototype to production—and they're less likely to support investments in projects they think are too slow.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Data Science Platform Offers New Capabilities</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Many businesses have come to realize that data science work without an integrated platform is inefficient, insecure, and difficult to scale. This realization has led to the rise of data science platforms. A data science platform is the software hub around which all data science work revolves. A great platform can reduce many of the challenges of implementing data science and help businesses turn data into insights more quickly and efficiently.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With a centralized machine learning platform, data scientists can work in a collaborative environment using their favorite open source tools, with all work synchronized through a version control system.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Advantages of Data Science Platforms</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A data science platform enables teams to share code, results, and reports, reducing redundancies and driving innovation. It removes bottlenecks in the workflow by simplifying management and incorporating best practices.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Overall, a great data science platform can:</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Improves productivity by helping data scientists deliver models faster and reduce errors<br>Make it easier for data scientists to process large volumes of different types of data<br>Deliver enterprise-grade AI that is unbiased, auditable, replicable, and trusted<br>Data science platforms are built to support collaboration among users, including data science experts, general data scientists, data engineers, and machine learning engineers or experts. For example, data science platforms allow data scientists to deploy models as APIs, making it easy to integrate them into different applications. Data scientists can access tools, data and infrastructure without waiting for IT intervention.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Market demand for data science platforms has exploded. In fact, the platform market is projected to grow at a CAGR of over 39% over the next few years, reaching $385 billion in 2025.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>What Platform Capabilities Do Data Scientists Need</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When looking at the capabilities of a data science platform, some key features to consider include:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Choose a project-based UI to facilitate collaboration.</strong> The platform should enable staff to collaborate from model ideation to final development. It should support self-service access to data and resources for all team members.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Prioritize integration and flexibility.</strong> Make sure the platform supports new open source tools as well as common version control providers like GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket, and is tightly integrated with other resources.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Contains enterprise-level features</strong>. Make sure the platform can scale as your team and business grow. The platform should have strong access control and high availability and support a large number of concurrent users.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>More powerful self-service for data science. </strong>Look for a platform that reduces the burden on IT and engineering, making it easy and convenient for data scientists to instantly spin up environments, track all work, and easily deploy models into production.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Simplified model deployment.</strong> Model deployment and operation is a very important step in the machine learning lifecycle, but it is often overlooked. Make sure you choose a service that helps simplify model operations, whether it provides an API or ensures that users can build models in an easy-to-integrate way.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Make using a data science platform a smart move</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It's time for your business to use a data science platform if you notice the following:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Lack of productivity and collaboration.</li><li>Unable to audit or replicate machine learning models.</li><li>The model was never deployed to production.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A data science platform can create tangible value for your business. Oracle Data Science Platform provides rich services and a comprehensive end-to-end experience to accelerate model deployment and improve data science outcomes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[What is data science? How do you use data analysis to expand your business?]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/what-is-data-science/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 14 Jun 2022 15:14:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=903</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br>If you follow the digital world, you may have heard of the term Data Science as well as the terms Machine Learning or Artificial Intelligence, Big Data or any other similar term.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These keywords have gained a lot of sparkle in our daily news, every day technology companies release new developments in the market.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Artificial intelligence is present in many of these developments, such as autonomous cars, which can take trips without a driver inside. Another example: cleaning robots that sweep dust and clean homes without any human assistance.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>What few people know is that the key technical principles that help develop these autonomous cars can also be used to improve businesses, especially digital businesses.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Another point that few people notice is that using these techniques is much easier than it seems, but before we get to practical examples it is important to understand more deeply what (data science) means.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What does the concept Data Science mean?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is an English term that means data science. It is a field of study that uses scientific methods to obtain knowledge through data, to provide support for decision-making.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Companies generally use data science techniques to analyze data and make decisions that help expand business.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Making the most hit decisions is not always an easy task, which is why data science is a diverse and multidisciplinary field of education, incorporating knowledge in mathematics, statistics, computers and business.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>data science fields<br>Diverse fields of data science</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A good point is that technical advances have democratized data science. Today, there are many tools that can help ordinary people use Data Science in business, even without mastering the techniques of statistics and mathematics.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In this post we will provide some practical examples that explain how people use these techniques to make better decisions, increase sales and expand business.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>But, how does Data Science work in practice?<br>Away from theory, the first step to start using data science in any business is to practically understand how Data Science works, and identify the necessary stages that help make the best decisions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In the picture, we find boxes for the stages of decision-making<br>Summary of the stages that help in making decisions</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There is no consensus that there is a specific and convenient way to work with data science, but the process is generally divided into 7 stages:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Phases of data science application<br>The stages on which the application of data science is based</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>Ask questions<br>The Data Science process usually begins with a question that must be answered. And then we organize a list of 10 most common questions that are directed to those who deal with digital products:</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1- How much will the sales figures be in the coming months?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2- What will happen if I completely change the design of the product page?<br>3- What are the qualities that determine the success of the affiliate marketer in selling the product?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>4- What is the appropriate time to go to the customer and present the product?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>5- What is the amount of money that should be invested in the field of network traffic to get the specific results?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>6- What is the ideal price for the product?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>7- When you can introduce a new product to the customer?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>8- How many emails must be given to the lead before the product is presented to him?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>9- What is the great form for content marketing? Articles in a blog or through videos?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>10- What is the best month to do launch events? What is the ideal time to start selling?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true,"start":2} -->
<ol start="2"><li>Data collection<br>Then it is necessary to search for data that can help answer these questions. YOu can collect This data from c different sources, example:</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Systems and applications.<br>Internet searches.<br>Data of organizations and companies.<br>Research.<br>The truth is that there are countless sources of data, and it is very important to find a source that presents the information in a reliable and structured manner. Here are some examples:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To forecast sales figures for the coming months, it can be useful to analyze sources that verify sales figures to date. For this, you will need to extract your sales history. On the other hand, if you notice that your sales result is directly related to your traffic volume, you can find the necessary data to answer this question by using an analytics tool like Hotmart Analytics!!<br>One way to discover the ideal moment at which to approach a customer and present your product is to analyze all the actions you have taken with your old customers. This can be done either with those who bought your product or with those who did not do so, trying to understand the reasons that led customers to buy, or made them back away from it.<br>If the question is which content format works best – blogs or videos – you will need to compare the interaction data of leads who read blog articles with the interaction data of leads who watched videos. This data is brought to you by the Youtube Analytics tool.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true,"start":3} -->
<ol start="3"><li>Data processing and organization<br>With the collected data, it is very important to clean, coordinate, process and organize the information. This happens because the resulting data often suffers from inconsistencies that may negatively affect analysis and wrong decision-making.</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When the data is processed and organized, the analysis process can begin.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true,"start":4} -->
<ol start="4"><li>Data analysis<br>There are several types of analytics. It varies from simple to very complex operations. But it is important to remember that in most cases the analysis of basic data leads to results </li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Very valuable for your business.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The reason is very simple: With so many people and companies not in the habit of looking at numbers, people who start out with data analysis (even if it's just a little bit) usually get ahead of their competitors.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true,"start":5} -->
<ol start="5"><li>Develop models and algorithms<br>In cases where data analysis becomes complex, or raises more new questions than it provides answers to the main question, it may be time to create statistical and algorithmic models to find the solution that will bring the most value to your business.</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These models and algorithms are necessary as the “human brain” cannot find the best models to solve a problem or when it finds a solution to a problem it may take a lot of time…</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>An algorithm can be used to find patterns that humans are unaware of, or even to analyze millions of scenarios in just a few minutes, leading to a more on-target decision in a short period of time.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In the example the following, we can get understand how this is working.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Let's say I have a base of 5,000 leads, I send out 7 emails per month for the last 4 years, and there are over 1.6 million events that need to be analyzed in order to try to find a standard model that explains the behavior of leads.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Even if I focus all my attention on this analysis, it will probably take me a lot of time to find standard patterns that a single algorithm can detect in a matter of seconds.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If I wanted to understand the best way to advertise on Facebook, I could analyze 50 different indicators for each of the ads I set up.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>But how can I find out which indicators are important to my audience?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If I want to test design details on my page that increase the chances of visitors buying my product, I will need:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Generate many different pages.</li><li>Separate the groups of users who will access each of these pages.</li><li>Finding a way to ensure that a user from a specific group accesses only one page until I finish evaluating the results of the different pages.</li><li>This is a bit complicated, but it can be done in a simple way through some applications.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true,"start":6} -->
<ol start="6"><li>Data preview<br>After using models and algorithms, it will be necessary to analyze the results visually to ensure that the analytical results are consistent with the objective of the study.</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This visual analysis is done on the basis of graphs, which facilitate the process of checking the models and help in making decisions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true,"start":7} -->
<ol start="7"><li>Make decisions<br>Now that this data is ready for analysis, we get to the most important moment: making strategic decisions for your business.</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>By checking the patterns found, you can see what works well, and discover areas that need improvement. This allows you to apply new procedures and tests to improve your results.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These decisions will of course depend on the type of business, and on the appearance that needs improvement.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is important before deciding what action to take, that you analyze the data that you have, in order to choose the most appropriate decision for your business.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>How can I apply Data Science to expand my business?<br>Being a multi-angle field of education, data science can be applied to practically all challenges facing digital businesses.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Here are some common examples of using data science to generate results from a digital business:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Conversion Analysis in Sales Funnel.<br>Analyze visitor behavior data on your pages.<br>Product pricing.<br>Investigate uncommon and fraudulent behavior.<br>Analyzing the feelings of followers on social networks.<br>Product guidance systems for customers.<br>Predicting when a customer will stop paying a subscription (churn rate or churn forecast).<br>Enrichment and classification of leads with a view to prioritizing.<br>Forecasting the total sales rate.<br>Classification of customers according to their buying behavior.<br>Improve the shopping cart by adding more products and forming groups of products.<br>Finally, here are two practical tips to get you started with Data Science in your business right now:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Tip 1: How can you use Web Analytics to investigate patterns of visitor behavior on your pages and sell more?<br>One of the main advantages of a 100% digital business when compared to an offline business, is the amount of information that can be obtained online.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When you install an analytics tool on your site, you immediately start gaining tons of information that can be analyzed to generate better results for your business.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Some examples of important information obtained through these tools are:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The origin of the visit: Where did the client come from? Or on which link we click to get to your page?<br>The average (avg) time visitors stay on your page.<br>Pages and products visited.<br>Abandonment rate: This is the percentage of visitors who leave your page without clicking any other link.<br>The modalities of the links the visitor clicked on are: UTMs, SRC, and SCK.<br>The number of visitors who performed a specific action on your site (eg clicked the link in checkout or logged in). In such cases, you will need to set up these procedures through the Analytical Tool).<br>The most well-known and frequently used analytics tool is Google Analytics, but there are many other complementary tools, and choosing the best tool depends on the unique characteristics of each business.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Hotmart Analytics, for example, contains a series of resources for anyone who sells digital products on the Internet.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>After the tool is installed, the metrics are collected and you have the data you need to make decisions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Tip 2 - How do you prioritize leads based on data enrichment and leads ranking?<br>One of the best ways to make more sales online is to classify the ways to communicate with each customer.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Presenting a product in the </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The moment when the lead is ready to buy is the best way to increase the results, so that you are not considered to be a spam offering to sell products all the time.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To do this kind of analysis and understand when is the right time for your product, you'll basically need two tools:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The first is an email marketing tool, ie: mail chimp and LeadLovers. or other tools.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Next, you should use ListBoss, a Hotmart tool that allows integration between Hotmart's digital platform and your chosen email marketing service.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>After the integration is done, you can set up your marketing tool of choice to receive events and notifications every time a lead does one of the following:<br>Invoice issuance.<br>Abandon the cart.<br>Cancel the purchase.<br>A purchase coin is subject to a chargeback.<br>A purchase is accepted.<br>A purchase subject to a complaint.<br>Money back purchase.<br>An expired purchase.<br>Completed purchase.<br>Download a product.<br>Register in the Hotmart Club (the membership area for hosting digital courses).<br>Product evaluation.<br>This is the first point in order to decide when it is appropriate to send an email aimed at recovering unrealized sales.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A customer who visits the Checkout page and abandons the cart has a much higher chance of buying the product from a customer who doesn't even know you have it for sale.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>So this information is critical to determine the moment you send a new email to this customer.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With all this information subject to registration via the email marketing tool, you can start setting actions for each of the mentioned cases.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Example:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You can send a welcome email as soon as the customer installs the digital product, or even thank them when they evaluate their purchase. These actions help you build a closer relationship with your customer and increase trust among buyers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Analyze your data<br>The tips we provided above address some cases, but there are countless other possibilities for using these numbers and expanding your business.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The complexity in data analysis tends to arise when a business begins to mature a lot and so we have large amounts of information.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>But the most important thing is that you start collecting data.. We have a lot of useful tips that help digital content producers use metrics to get the best results. Feel free to read and learn about it!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>What's your opinion ? Do you consider that you have learned what is important in the field of Data Science? You can comment about your experience or opinions in the comments space and we are waiting…</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Good luck!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Statistical Data (Introduction, Classification)]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/statistical-data/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 15 Jun 2022 16:26:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=906</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Statistical data </strong>is a general term for the digital data and other data related to the national economy and social phenomena obtained in the process of statistical work activities. Statistics are the results of measuring a phenomenon. For example, a measure of total economic activity can yield data on the <strong>gross domestic product (GDP);</strong> a measure of stock price changes can yield data on a stock price index, and a measure of population gender can yield data such as male or female. The classification of statistical data is explained from different perspectives below. Statistical data is the product of the statistical work day. From the perspective of the statistical work process, the quality of statistical data is "standard", and it must accurately reflect the objective reality.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Introduction to Statistics</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Statistical data are data that express the characteristics, scale, structure, level, and other indicators of natural economic elements in a geographical area. It is the basic data for qualitative, positioning and quantitative statistical analysis. Such as what we usually call the statistical yearbook.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Data Classification</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Statistical data can be expressed in two forms: statistical tables and statistical maps.<br>The representation method, it is divided into:<br><strong>i. District statistics</strong>. That is, the area of ​​the graph or the number of the same graph represents the sum of all similar phenomena in the zoning unit; for example, the 2008 American Community Survey one-year data sample file population.<br><strong>ii. Grading statistics. </strong>That is, it is classified according to administrative divisions or economic zones in the form of statistical charts, and the difference between the relative indicators of the phenomenon is represented by different shades of color or halo lines and halo points of varying density;<br><strong>iii. Location statistics.</strong> The special phenomenon and change law at a certain point are represented in the form of statistical charts.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>According to statistical indicators, statistics are divided into macroeconomic indicators statistics and industry economic indicators statistics.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Common macroeconomic indicators are GDP, CPI, PPI, [2] PMI and cash in circulation.<br>Industry economic indicators such as the coal industry, analysis of the prosperity of the oil industry, etc.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Statistical data is the result of measuring things using a certain measurement scale, and different types of statistical data will be obtained by using different measurement scales. From the results of the above four measurement scales, the statistical data can be divided into the following four types:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Categorical data</strong> - expressed as categories, but without distinguishing the order, it is formed by the classification scale measurement.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Ordinal data</strong> - presented as categories, but in order, formed by ordinal scale measurements.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Fixed-distance data</strong> - expressed as numerical values, which can be added and subtracted, and are formed by the measurement of fixed-distance scales.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Ratio data </strong>- expressed as a numerical value, which can be added, subtracted, multiplied, and divided, and is formed by the measurement of a fixed ratio scale.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The first two types of data describe the quality characteristics of things, which cannot be represented by data, and the results are expressed as categories, also known as qualitative data or quality data (Oualitative data); the latter two types of data describe the quantitative characteristics of phenomena, which can be It is represented by numerical values, so it is also called quantitative data or quantitative data (Quantitative data). Since the fixed-distance scale and the fixed-ratio scale belong to the same measurement level, the latter two kinds of data can be regarded as the same type of data, collectively referred to as quantitative data or numerical data.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is important to distinguish between the level of measurement and the type of data, because different types of data will be processed and analyzed using different statistical methods. For example, for categorical data, the frequency or frequency of each group is usually calculated, the mode and difference ratio are calculated, and [3] contingency table analysis and x2 test are performed; for ordinal data, the median and Interquartile range, calculation of rank correlation coefficient and other non-parametric analysis; more statistical methods can be used to deal with interval or ratio data, such as calculation of various statistics, parameter estimation and testing, etc. Most of what we deal with is quantitative data.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It should be pointed out here that statistical methods applicable to low-level measurement data are also applicable to higher-level measurement data, because the latter has the mathematical properties of the former. For example, when describing the central tendency of data, the mode is usually calculated for categorical data, and the median is usually calculated for ordinal data, but the mode and median can also be calculated for interval and ratio data. Conversely, statistical methods that are suitable for high-level measurement data cannot be used for lower-level measurement data, because low-level data do not have the mathematical properties of high-level measurement data. For example, averages can be calculated for interval and ratio data, but not for categorical and ordinal data. Understanding this is useful for choosing a statistical analysis method.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Data Collection </strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Statistical data mainly come from two channels: one is from direct investigation and scientific experiment, which is the direct source of statistical data, called first-hand or direct statistical data; , which is an indirect source of statistics, called secondary or indirect statistics.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>The organizational form of statistical data collection</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The organizational forms of statistical data collection include censuses, sample surveys, statistical reports, key surveys, and typical surveys.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Census</strong>: A census is a one-time comprehensive survey specially organized for a specific purpose to collect comprehensive information on important national conditions, national strength and resources, and provide a basis for the government to formulate plans, guidelines and policies.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Sampling survey:</strong> Sampling survey is the most widely used survey method in practice. It randomly selects a part of the unit seat sample from the population of the survey object for survey, and infers the overall quantitative characteristics according to the sample survey results. Comprehensive survey method.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Statistical report: </strong>Statistical report is an investigation method mainly based on comprehensive investigation. It is arranged by the competent government department in accordance with statistical regulations, in the form of statistical tables and administrative means from top to bottom, and then by enterprises and institutions from the bottom. An investigation method that provides basic statistical data level by level, and the upper level summarizes and reports it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Key investigation:</strong> Key investigation is a kind of non-comprehensive investigation specially organized. It selects individual or some key units in the whole to conduct investigation to understand the basic situation of the whole.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Typical survey:</strong> Typical survey is also a kind of non-comprehensive survey specially organized. It is based on the purpose and requirements of the survey and research, on the basis of a comprehensive analysis of the whole, and consciously selects representative typical units to conduct in-depth and detailed investigations. In order to understand the essential characteristics of things, causal relationships and the laws of development and change.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>How to collect statistical data</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In the actual survey, the specific methods of collecting data mainly include an interview survey, mail survey, telephone survey, symposium, individual in-depth interviews, and an online survey.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Interview survey:</strong> An interview survey, also known as a dispatch survey, is a survey method in which the investigator and the respondent obtain the required information through face-to-face conversation.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Postal survey:</strong> Postal survey is a survey method in which the questionnaire is sent to the respondents by mail or other means, the respondents fill in, and then send the questionnaire back or put it at the designated collection point.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Telephone survey:</strong> Telephone survey is a survey method in which investigators use the telephone to communicate with the respondents in language to obtain information. The advantages of telephone surveys are fast timeliness and low cost; the disadvantages are that the number of survey questions should not be too large.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Symposium:</strong> Symposium, also known as the collective interview method, is a method of gathering a group of respondents at the survey site and asking them to express their opinions on the subject of the survey, thereby obtaining survey data. This method is suitable for collecting the tendencies and opinions of a small number of people closely related to the research topic.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Individual in-depth interview:</strong> An individual in-depth interview is a special qualitative study involving only one respondent at a time. Often used in motivational research to uncover the deep-seated opinions of respondents that are not superficial. This method is most suitable for studying more secret issues, such as personal privacy; more sensitive issues and so on.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Online survey:</strong> Online survey mainly includes three methods: E-mail, interactive CATI system and Internet CGI program.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Network Topology (Linear (BUS), Star, Ring, Tree, comb)]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/network-topology/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 16 Jun 2022 18:54:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=909</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Network topology is the structure in which the links and nodes of the network are connected, whether it is a biological network or a computer network . Computer network topology may refer to the physical topology of the network or to the logical topology. The Physical topology deals with the design of the network in terms of the devices and the cables and their positions, while logical topology is concerned with how the data actually flow in the network regardless of the physical shape of the network.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Local area networks are one example of a network that exhibits both types of topologies (physical, logical). As any node in a local area, network connects one or more links to other nodes in the network, and the layout of these links and nodes in geometric shape determines the physical topology of the network, similarly, to the planning of information flow, (information transfer) between network nodes determines a logical topology of the network. In the sample words, the physical and logical topologies may or may not be the same in the given network.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>The main types of network topologies</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When studying the main types of network topologies, we distinguish five main types:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Linear (BUS)</li><li>star</li><li>Ring</li><li>Tree</li><li>comb</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Physical topology</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Diagram of network nodes and the physical connections between them, for example: the configuration of wires, the location of the nodes and the connections between them, and the cabling system.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Types of Physical Topology:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>node to node (PointToPoint):</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is the simplest network topology and is a permanent link between the ends of two nodes. Switched one point to another topology is the basic form of traditional telephony. The reality is that this topology is switched means that it uses directed packets or circuit switching technology. from one node to another node circuit can be set up dynamically and removed when it is not needed.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Linear (Bus):</strong><br>In local area networks (LANs) that use this topology, all devices are connected through a single cable with some kind of link. A piece called a terminal must be placed at the end of each cable in a linear network to prevent the signal from bouncing back into the cable. When the signal is issued from one of the computers, it goes in both directions to the rest of the devices are connected on the serial cable until it finds out the physical or logical address of the intended receiver, but if the address of any of a network devices does not match an address of the desired receiver, the transmitted data will ignore.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Since the network consists of a single cable, its cost is low compared to the rest of the networks, but on the other hand, the cost of managing it is relatively high, in addition to the fact that when the cable breaks or breaks, this leads to the disruption of the entire network. Among the forms of this structure:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Linear Bus:</strong><br>A type of network topology in which all network nodes connect to a common transmission medium that has only two ends (often called a backbone or trunk). All data exchanged by network elements passes through it and can be received from virtually all nodes simultaneously (ignoring generation delays).</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Distributed Serial:</strong><br>It is the type of network topology in which all network nodes are connected to a common transmission medium that has two or more parties that is created by adding branches to the main part. It shares a common transmission medium.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Star:</strong><br>In local area networks (LANs) that use this topology, all machines are connected to a hub. In contrast to a linear topology, here each machine can communicate with the central axis as a point to point. All signals pass through the central axis which acts as a signal amplifier or repeater allowing the signal to reach a further distance. In this architecture, each computer has a direct connection to the hub.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Stellar topologies are among the easiest and most popular to design and implement.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>One of the advantages of this topology is that it is easy to add a new node to the network, and one of its disadvantages is that the disruption of the central hub leads to the disruption of the entire network. Among the forms of this structure:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Extended star:</strong><br>A form of network topology in which one or more repeaters are located between the central hub and other nodes or terminals where the repeater is used to increase the transmission distance between the central hub and the node.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Distributed star:</strong><br>It is a form of network topology that is based on networks connected to each other by star topologies and connected to each other by linear topologies.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Ring:</strong><br>In networks that use this topology, each computer is connected to a closed loop, and each machine has a unique address for identification purposes. The signal passes through all the computers connected in the same direction, and this network uses the token passing method to regulate the transmission tolerance in the network, where only the node that owns the token can broadcast in the network and the rest of the computers act as repeaters or repeaters of the signal. One of the most famous examples of networks that use this topology is token ring networks.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>One of the disadvantages of this network is that the failure of one node in the network leads to the failure of the entire network.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Tree</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In these networks, there is a central root (the first level) and it is connected to one or more node at a lower level than it (the second level) and the connections between them are node to node and also these points that are connected to the root will connect on the other hand to one or more points of a lower level by node to node (Point) To Point). For each of the nodes there is a fixed number of nodes that it connects to from the lower level, this number is called the branching factor.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Notes:</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Networks with tree topologies must be at least three levels because if they consist of one root and one level, they are considered<a href="https://wiki.asterisk.org/wiki/display/AST/Asterisk+Architecture%2C+The+Big+Picture" target="_blank" aria-label=" topologies Asterisk (opens in a new tab)" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="ek-link"> topologies Asterisk</a>. Also, a network with a tree topology with a branching coefficient of 1 devolves into a network with linear topology.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Hybrids:</strong><br>Produced when more than one topology is used in the network (eg linking between a star and a ring topology in a single network).</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Boolean Topology</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In contrast to physical topology, logical topology is the way a signal behaves between network nodes, or is the way data is transmitted from one device to another in the network regardless of the physical connection method.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Logical topology is not necessarily the same as physical topology, for example:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In Ethernet networks that use twisted-pair Ethernet, they follow a logical linear topology with the appearance of physical linear topology.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In IBM's Token Ring networks, they follow a ring logical topology with the appearance of a physical star topology.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Note: Signal topology differs from logical topology where logical topology expresses the shape of the path that data takes between network nodes, while it expresses the true path of signals (optical, electronic) when it passes between nodes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Computer Network Addressing(IP, MAC, DLCI, TCP)]]></title>
		<link>https://techodu.com/computer-network-addressing/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 18 Jun 2022 08:27:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://techodu.com/?p=916</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Computer network addressing</strong>: In real life, when we express things to a friend's house, we first need to know the specific address of his house to the house number. Similarly, in the computer<strong> network</strong> communication address, there is also an address structure. Specifically, point-to-point, we can use the computer network address structure to communicate with the postal service. The structure of the address is understood by comparison: the network address is imagined as the name of the city and the street; the physical address is likened to the house number, and the port address is very similar to which person under the same house receives the letter.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>IP</strong> <strong>Addressing</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Computer network addressing: </strong>It is the IP address that identifies which network the target host is on. IP addresses are represented by four dotted decimal numbers, such as 172.155.32.120. It's just that the IP address is a composite address, and it is the address of a host in its entirety. Only look at the first half, indicating the network address. The address 172.155.32.120 represents the address of a host, and 172.155.0.0 represents the network address of the network where the host is located.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The IP address is encapsulated in the IP header of the datagram. IP addresses serve two purposes: routers on the network use the IP addresses to determine the destination network address and then determine which port to forward packets to. Another use is that the source host uses the IP address of the target host to query the physical address of the target host.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>MAC</strong> <strong>Addressing</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Computer network addressing:</strong> The physical address is encapsulated in the frame header of the datagram. A typical physical address is the MAC address in Ethernet. The MAC address is used in two places: the network card in the host determines. Whether the datagram sent by the network is sent to itself through the destination MAC address in the header; the switch in the network uses the destination MAC address in the header to determine the destination of the datagram. Which port to forward. Examples of other physical addresses are the DLCI address in Frame Relay networks and the SPID in ISDN.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The port address is encapsulated in the datagram's TCP header or UDP header. The port address is the source host telling the destination host which application the datagram is sand to. If the target port address in the TCP header indicates. 80 it indicates that the data is sent to the<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Service_(systems_architecture)" target="_blank" aria-label=" WWW service program (opens in a new tab)" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="ek-link"> WWW service program</a>; if it is 25130, it is sent to the CS game program of the opposite host.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Computer networks rely on the joint addressing of network addresses, physical addresses, and port addresses to complete data transmission. Without any of these addresses, the network cannot complete addressing. (The communication of point-to-point connection is an exception. In point-to-point communication. Two hosts are directly connect with a physical line, and the data sent by the source host will only reach the other host along this physical line, and the physical address is not necessary.)</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Stay with <strong><a href="https://techodu.com" target="_blank" aria-label="Techodu (opens in a new tab)" rel="noreferrer noopener" class="ek-link">Techodu</a></strong> you will get more information about networking.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

You definitely realize how to bring an issue to light and make it important. More people should look at this and understand this side of the story. I was surprised that youre not more popular since you surely possess the gift.]]></wp:comment_content>
